The landlord is super responsive and helpful, catering to all my needs instantly. The room is clean and tidy. The neighborhood is peaceful and close to the lake and all sorts of cute cafes. Enjoy your inner peace here.

Quyens  was a home from home, so cosy and welcoming.  A sanctuary in a busy city...we really looked forward to coming back and relaxing after our explorations in Vietnam.  a wonderful experience for us ... everything we could possibly need was there..modern,  spotless with  every amenity. Bright and comfortable, great views of the cityscape, very accessible. We loved our stay and hope to be back. Quyen made our stay fantastic.

We stayed at this cozy studio hosted by Quyen for a week, and it was a fantastic experience. The location is unbeatable - just a minute away from West Lake, which made for peaceful mornings and lovely evening walks.
The sunrise from the balcony is also extremely beautiful, and we loved having our coffee with that view.
The studio itself was clean, well-furnished, and exactly as described. It had everything I needed for a comfortable stay, including strong Wi-Fi, a comfy bed, and great air conditioning - much appreciated in the summer heat. The large window with a view of the lake was definitely a highlight!
Quyen was a thoughtful and responsive host, always quick to answer any questions and make sure everything went smoothly.
Would highly recommend this place for solo travelers or couples looking for a relaxing, scenic stay in Hanoi.
The apartment was clean and located in a nice area. Great views from the balcony. The host was friendly and helpful.

This place is very affordable and cute! Phuong Anh was very accommodating, friendly and helpful with all of my inquiries. I highly recommend her place. ğŸ’¯

This place is THE BEST Airbnb I've ever stayed at. They really take things to the next level. They sent clear instructions with pics, including shots of the location from the street, so you can easily find it. I instantly/confidently knew I was there when I arrived. I think every host should do that.
The place itself is so well kept, comfy and feels like home. If you're working remotely (like me) the wifi is reliable and super fast. I was hitting 300Mbps there.
In case you're still on the fence, book this place. you'll thank me later! :)

Thanks so much! You saved us! We were at another Airbnb that did not live up to our expectations and we were fortunate to find Tungs hidden gem VERY last minute! We booked at 7pm and were in the unit by 8pm. Fridge stocked with cold waters and beer. A beautiful room with a nice big TV and a perfect laundry set up. The staff brought us extra pillows and the welcome booklet provided us with some great food recos ! Thanks so much. Saved our evening!

Had a wonderful time at Veque. We got room 204 and it was exactly how it was in the photos. The host was very friendly and responsive in the chats. Love the face there is a dedicated space to keep your luggage and a sofato rest in case you reach early or want to explore the city after check out and don't need to carry it around. There is also a washing machine and dryer available to use which came in very handy for us. Having Netflix is a great touch to relax at the room after a long day of exploring Hanoi.  Overall great experience!

I can give them 100 stars if possible. They are very accommodating. The room and public area are clean. They even let us to use a room where we can stay after our tour in Halong Bay and even use the bathroom on 2nd floor in last building. Very generous. They have drop off luggage where you can store your luggages before or after your check in. The host helped us to carry our luggages too.

worth every penny we spent on this booking. Host was very proactive helped us on smooth check in process the property was approiate with the given description. Overall had a wonderful experience with stay and my time at this place!!

We had an amazing stay at Veque Villa Hanoi! The place was aesthetic, super clean, with cold aircon and just a short walk to all the main spots. But what truly made our stay special was the warm hospitality of Huong. She was always so pleasing, sweet, and helpful, making sure we felt welcome and at home from the moment we arrived. Her genuine kindness added a personal touch that made all the difference! Highly recommended to anyone visiting Hanoi!

My stay at Veque Villa was awesome! Miss Huong , my host, went beyond helpful in making my stay an enjoyable experience! Actually I wanted to stay longer but her room was booked! I highly recommend staying at Veque Villa a beautiful French Colonial villa! Beautiful section of Hanoi too!!
Stay was very comfortable. Huong was very helpful and always had a smile on her face. She made us feel at home even though there was language barrier between us. She took really good care of us.
Thank you for a fantastic stay, it was just what we needed after we arrived in Hanoi, a real piece of calm and quiet. Hueng was so helpful and even did our laundry which was much appreciated.

Very clean and comfortable room in a great area of Hanoi, around a 10/15 minute walk from the lake. Friendly staff and on site washing facilities was a big plus. Felt safe and secure,  had filtered water available and there are some really good food places nearby. Fully reccomend and would definitely stay again, thanks!

We hadden een erg fijn verblijf tijdens onze eerste stop in Vietnam. Op voorhand kregen we al wat tips voor Hanoi en kregen we duidelijke instructies over de check-in. Dat was erg handig, want we kwamen laat op de avond aan. Toen we aankwamen waren we aangenaam verrast. Huong had voor ons de kamer klaargemaakt. Alles was heel proper en netjes. Het appartement was erg rustig gelegen. Op 20 minuuutjes wandelen stonden we in Old Quarter. Dankjewel voor het aangename verblijf!

Veque Villa was such a calm and lovely place to stay. Itâ€™s in a quieter part of Hanoi but still close enough to the Old Quarter to get around easily. The instructions to reach the place were super clear, and it was very easy to find. Ms. Huong and the host was amazing - so responsive even before check-in and throughout my stay. She helped with everything, from an early check-in to connecting me with a great local for bike rentals. The space itself was exactly as described, and I really felt at ease here. They were also kind enough to be flexible with my checkout. Total recommendation if you want a smooth, peaceful stay that's still well-connected to the city

Dzung and Tahyâ€™s place is beautifully designed with a very aesthetic interior. It was spotless and located right in the heart of the bustling Hanoi Old Quarter super convenient! They were very responsive and provided a detailed, helpful guide that made finding the place easy, even with the small alley walk. The home feels like a hidden gem tucked right into the city. The apartment was nice. It has enough space for us and was walkable to HoÃ n Kiem lake and many attractions in the Old quarter. The instructions on how to find the apartment was easy to follow. Comfy bed and strong WiFi signal.
We had a storm with torrential rain in that caused a leak in the roof. The host was quick to respond to our message and sent someone over the next morning to fix it.

We stayed here for 4 days and really enjoyed the Airbnb. Its got a nice location and you can walk everywhere or take a grab if you need. The apartment is very homey- we were impressed with the intelligent way the interior design was done. It has a loft for extra people and a good table for working (we had to work remotely full time during our stay). The shower is great and the bathroom corner is cleverly integrated in the apartment. They also had a washing machine :) I recommend this place and will definitely try to return !

Hanoi Soul Stay on Hang Bai Street is honestly the perfect spot if youâ€™re visiting Hanoi. The location is unbeatable, right in the city center with cafes, shops and famous sights just a short walk away, yet the place itself feels calm and cozy. The room was super clean, well-designed and had lovely little details that made it feel like home. I especially appreciated how much natural light it had. The host was incredibly welcoming and helpful with great local tips, which made exploring the city so easy. If you want a comfortable, charming stay in the heart of Hanoi, I highly recommend this place.

We had an excellent time staying at Olive Garden. We actually extended our stay twice. The surroundings were a peaceful sanctuary in an otherwise noisy and manic place. We walked to many of the attractions in Hanoi. There is a street market within a few minutes walk. We could buy tofu, vegetables and fruits.
The house is spacious. We were happy to have separate living and sleeping spaces. We used the kitchen to make meals. The television is large and good quality. The bathroom has two fans and the water heated very quickly. We had plenty of towels. The air conditioning was effective and kept us cool.
This was a great place to stay in Hanoi. Highly recommended if you like peace and quiet!

This apartment was the perfect place for our cozy time in Hanoi. It was so beautiful, clean and a special and cozy place. Perfect for a couple wanting to be in the middle of everything. Veque Maison is an excellent choice for Hanoi, central to the Old Quarter but just far enough away you don't deal with the same volume of traffic, pedestrians, and excessive noise. It's within walking distance to many of Hanoi's top attractions and has every type of food, clothing, electronic, and service/product offering imaginable.

This was a beautiful room, and Lan was amazing. She was so helpful and responsive.
The train goes by the room and it's quite loud, although we both slept straight through any noise on all 4 nights we stayed.
Would definitely stay again!

I really enjoyed my stay here. The room looked exactly like the pictures and everything was very clean. Nam was very friendly and helpful, as was the housekeeper. Great location with lots of Japanese restaurants in the area.

Stayed here for a few nights whilst in Hanoi and really enjoyed it.
The apartment is located in the French Quarter (which is just slightly south of the Old Quarter). It looks exactly as pictured and described, we were satisfied with the overall cleanliness also. The host even messaged beforehand to inform us of construction in the building next door and provided ear plugs, however although the next door building was a construction site, construction was not active during our stay - so we had no noise complaints!
Only thing to be mindful of is there are a few flights of stairs to go up to access the apartment (and no elevators), which may make it difficult for some people to carry luggage up. But I would definitely recommend!

Loved this gem in old quarter. It soon became our oasis. Beautiful aesthetics and so close to everything. This cute apartment is in an old Vietnamese building.
The only pain point is the ongoing construction... but it was ok. Thankyou so much Brian for lending us your space.

Amazing place. There is a big change in perception of the staircase/hallway and the apartment. The place is fresh and well looked after. Modern, comfortable, clean. The host provided few necessities - drinking water, earplugs, toothbrush, sweets etc.

This was a perfect spot for us! They had the space ready for us within an hour. Other reviews mention the noise levels, but we didnâ€™t feel that it was that bad in comparison to other parts of Hanoi. We played some white noise just in case and had no issues! We would definitely stay again and would recommend to family and friends.

Beautiful apartment, close to Hoan Kiem lake. Omai provided very good instructions on how to find the apartment, it is on the 4th floor. We loved this place! Very comfortable bed, great shower, very zen. The bedroom has a beautiful tree in front of it. There is a bit of traffic noise, but I presume it is hard to find a quiet place in bustling Hanoi. Would recommend 100%.

Brianâ€™s (Omaiâ€™s) apartment was a lovely place to stay in Hanoi. Itâ€™s centrally located to Hoan Kiem lake and many other attractions. The apartment is modern, stylish, comfortable and the spacious bathroom was particularly appealing. Brian was very helpful and responsive and his assistance was greatly appreciated in booking an airport taxi for us. I would happily stay there again.
Very clean and aesthetically pleasing. Good air conditioning, very calm oasis feeling in a fun city.
We had a great stay at Omaiâ€™s place! The flat was gorgeous and clean. The bed was so comfortable too! Hosts were really helpful and friendly too.

Awesome stay. Location within walking distance to Train Street and Hoan Kiem Lake. Lots of food and coffee options nearby.
Vincent was very helpful with checking in and out, even carrying my luggage up the stairs. They also have a lot of recommendations with food, coffee, activities, etc. and are very responsive when I have questions. Best Airbnb host Iâ€™ve had so far!

The room is goodâ€”clean, comfortable, and spacious. The locker on the first/ground floor at the entrance was helpful. The stairs are a bit narrow, but itâ€™s not a big deal; just be mindful of your steps if carrying luggage. The neighborhood is perfect, with great proximity to food, attractions, and coffee shops. The hostâ€™s response to any concerns was quick, and he is very helpful with pretty much anything.
Our stay in this apartment was amazing! Communicative host, great area walking distance from everything in old town, and so clean! The bed was comfortable and the mini fridge was great!
Our stay here was short but very very sweet thanks to this wonderful AirBnB! Awesome central location, clean room and very helpful and responsive host. Great value - highly recommend!

Lovely, cosy room within the heart of Hanoi! The bed was comfortable and it was decorated tastefully, with lots of space for luggage. The recommendations from the book in the room were amazing!
Itâ€™s located up a narrow staircase but donâ€™t let it put you off because thatâ€™s the norm in a lot of Hanoi properties.

Perfect on essentially all fronts. Room was nice, location was great and the host had a good system for checking in and checking out. Not much to fault other than the sewage smell from the bathroom that seeped into the apartment at times. Wasn't too bad for us as we left the balcony door open to keep the apartment ventilated, but something to be wary of before booking.
Overall everything was Great, 4 stars just for the smell in toilet because of humidity. But on the other Hand there was SOOO much information provided about city places etc. so that was great!
i had a great stay. the location is perfect, you are close to almost everything. convenience store right next to the entrance and everything else very accessible.
Host is very helpful and accommodating during our stay in Hanoi. Guides (where to eat, shop, etc) is really helpful.
Cosy little apartment very well located with everything you need for a great stay in HanoÃ¯. Moreover, the host has a lot of great recommendations all around HanoÃ¯!
The stay was very clean and easy to find, and the host was communicative and helpful. I definitely recommend!

The place is very ideal. Key places are nearby and walkable. The host are very responsive, and helpful and easy to deal with. Thank you

Overall great location in heart of old quarter. Easy walking distance to restaurants, shops, coffeehouses. Clean place and accurate instructions. The stairs are narrow but it seems this is the nature of apartment in old quarter. So highly recommended ğŸ‘

location is really good and hosts are super caring. i had the misfortune of falling ill for sometime and they dropped off isotonic drinks and checked up on me! the only things to note are that the stairs arent really luggage friendly, and u can hear ur neighbours. but other than that, really clean and convenient place, w hosts who are there for u and are super responsive! thank u guys :-)

The host is very accommodating. Nice place to stay in old quarter
Great experience with Hanoi Stay With Us during my time in Hanoi. However, the internet is a bit unstable. But overall good. Highly recommend

very nice place to stay, the host was very responsive and helpful, you can walk to anywhere because its located in strategic location. But, one thing that you need to be careful if you bring big luggage because the stairs was small. Beside that, everythingâ€™s great, thank you

The Tung was a great host. I would definitely recommend this place to everyone visiting Hanoi. He was very responsive and helpful throughout the stay and event before we reached Hanoi. He made the stay a very good experience.
The location is great and easy to reach by foot or taxi/cab. All international travellers can stay here (currency exchange office close by, SIM card help is easy, food and cafe are all walkable, all tour buses pick up available).
The place looks exactly like the photo and everything mentioned is there in the stay.
Amazing experience.

The co-hosts were extremely responsive and provided multiple contact sources. The apartment itself was extremely close to train street, and walkable to many shops, restaurants and cafes. Most things including linen and towels were very clean. The co hosts were also flexible about check-in and luggage storage which was super helpful. Would recommend!

Wonderful place! It's clean, elegant, and exactly like the photos. It's also right in the midst of Old Quarter, by a pedestrian walkway with great restaurants and the famous train street. Not far from other cool sightseeing locations either. It's also above a nice little cafe, if you need a quick breakfast or coffee! Also, the host is so communicative and helpful--he was able to set up a car for us to transfer to and from the airport with ease! Highly recommended!
We stayed here twice in one week and it was a great choice! Right by tons of good restaurants and sightseeing locations! The host is super friendly and helpful as well. Very much recommend!

I really enjoyed my stay at Phuong's place, its located above a coffee shop (which I really liked the salted coffee) and we really enjoyed the space. It was like we got a little escape from the busy and bustling Hanoi (train street) and had our bohemian cute spot to relax after a long day of walking and exploring town. It was on a big road at the intersection so it was also really easy to call a grab to get to places.

We really liked our stay here. The location was perfect for us, easy to access and overall a really nice apartment. We loved the cafe downstairs as well. Phuong and the staff downstairs were an added bonus. They were all extremely friendly and accomodating, Phuong super responsive and easily contacted.

Phuong was the perfect host, helpful, and responsive and made us feel right at home. the apartment was exactly as described and the location was perfect!! it is right in the heart of old quarter and train street is only a few hundred metres away. beautiful and private place to stay. would highly recommend anyone to stay here if you are travelling to Hanoi!

This was an incredible spot - perfect central location but still peaceful and surprisingly quiet! The room was gorgeous and great design. Bed was really comfortable and the tub was lovely! Best of all was our hosts - super attentive and very kind. They checked in with us several times to ensure we had a wonderful stay, and we did! Thank you!!
had a wonderful stay this airbnb that's just walking distance away from train street and old quarter. it has all the amenities we need. When I go back to hanoi I'll definitely try to check in again.

Toan was the main person who communicated with me as the co-host and he was very responsive and had met my husband and I at the space when we arrived. We arrived before check in, so they had warmly allowed us to leave our luggage while we went to explore. It was just next to the train street, but once you got to the room you just shut out all the noise. There was a projector in the room and a bathtub, 2 things that are not common so that was really enjoyable for us. Bed was really comfortable too, and they had filtered water in the room so you could really stay all day in here. Definitely recommend this stay.

Outstanding Host and Exceptional Service! I had an amazing stay! The host went above and beyondâ€”when my baggage was lost at the airport, Mr. Toan immediately stepped in to help, offering support and guidance despite the late hour. Communication was excellent from start to finish, and he even arranged a taxi from the airport for me, making everything as smooth and stress-free as possible given the circumstances. Truly outstanding hospitality. If you're considering bookingâ€”donâ€™t hesitate! This place (and the host) is top-notch.

Stayed here 4 nights, was meant to stay 3 but we liked it so much we wanted to stay an extra night. The host was very friendly with quick response time. An amazing, stylish, quirky little apartment.
Very clean, good location in Old quarter. Itâ€™s a busy road but you canâ€™t hear much noise at all. Very lovely cafe at the bottom with delicious egg coffee. The only thing weâ€™d suggest is more storage space for large travel rucksacks but no big issue at all.
An excellent place to stay in the heart of the French quarter in Hanoi. We loved it and would book again in a heartbeat. Beautiful, clean apartment and walkable to so many sites!

Phuongâ€™s place in the old quarter is amazing. Right in the heart of everything in Hanoi, this place is clean and convenient. I highly recommend staying in Phuongâ€™s place.

Iâ€™m coming back here to this place on my next visit back to Hanoi. Thank you!

i love this airbnb so much. the room giving me princess vibeğŸŒ· Its very clean and organized. good price and located not far away from everything

This is my first time in an airbnb so I'm unable to compare this to others.
Firstly, nice and cosy accommodation suitable for 1 or 2 person. Located at the eastern tip of West Lake. Close by to alot of the monuments, ie the pagoda, imperial citadel and mausoleum to name a few.
Entrance is next to the back of a restaurant so it is a little bit dirty but the apartment itself is clean. When you're inside the apartment you will constantly get a whiff of food being prepared in the kitchen next door.
Place is noisy even during late night on weekdays(plenty of dog barking). No curtain for the windows to fully block the sunlight and no shower curtain in the toilet so floor might get a bit slippery.
Vivian herself is polite and helpful. Fast to reply and accommodating.
All in all, I believe it is more than worth the price. Thank you for having me, Vivian.
it's close to everything, nice restaurant, easy to find and get into. the best

Stayed here for three nights, I self checked in after midnight and it was an easy process to figure out. The building is very secure, didn't feel unsafe at all.
Location - I loved the location, I was amongst where the locals live, not the tourists. The studio flat is over an hour walk from Hanoi Old Quarter, Taxi/Bike is 15/20minutes.
Building - Please note this is a new building, there is currently work going on - until completed, you will hear banging.
Washing Machine - is located on the 7th floor, I messaged the owner as I didn't know where it was at the time (no details on AirBnB profile) the owner got back to me over 24hours later late at night, I was leaving the following morning.
Please note you will need to buy your on washing machine detergent etc.
Studio Room - Was perfect, nice clean bathroom, shower was lovely, comfortable bed, air con was a blessing and having a fridge to put my water in, couldn't go wrong.
Overall, I highly reccomend.

I had an amazing stay at My and Mei Meiâ€™s place. The location was absolutely perfect with everything I needed just around the corner, and it was only a short walk to the lake. The apartment itself felt like a true home, cozy and comfortable from the moment I arrived. What really made the experience special were the hosts. My and Mei Mei were incredibly helpful and kind, making me feel more like a local than a guest. Iâ€™d absolutely recommend staying here to anyone visiting the area.

Fantastic safe clean space in the Old Quarter. You can pick up a Grab or walk anywhere. The AC is fantastic! This is a great place with fresh linens. The family and host are incredibly kind people. There is a laundry downstairs which is incredibly convenient. My host helped me get a car to the airport at 4 AM and helped me get a cab when I arrived the second time. This is a great place if youâ€™re traveling solo or as a couple. Iâ€™ve stayed here twice and love it.

The best air bnb in Hanoi. I had an amazing stay here and the hosts were exceptionally friendly and helpful. The room was spotless and the bed was comfortable. I would stay here again without question

Lovely space with everything we needed.

Wonderful place to stay and just as the images showed! The hosts were super responsive and fast to reply to any questions also were flexible for us which I really appreciate! Thank you so much and maybe see you again soon

I had a wonderful stay at this homestay! The location is perfect - just a short walk to the Old Quarter and Hoan Kiem Lake, which made exploring the city super convenient. The apartment itself was clean, beautifully decorated, and fully equipped with everything I needed, from a comfy bed and modern bathroom and fast Wi-Fi. The host was very welcoming and responsive, offering great recommendations for local food and attractions. This place really felt like a peaceful retreat right in the heart of Hanoi. Highly recommended for both short and long stays!

This Airbnb is perfectly located in the heart of the Old Quarter. I could easily walk everywhere without needing Grab or taxis. Thereâ€™s a mini mart, pharmacy, and coffee shop right downstairs, which was super convenient. A washing machine is also available on the first floor.
My very first impression was how fresh and pleasantly scented the room always was. What impressed me the most was how kind and responsive the host was. They even replied to my messages at 1 AM to help me order food. I truly appreciated their warm hospitality. We had a wonderful and relaxing stay here, and I would definitely recommend this place to others.
Great central location. Washing machine on 1st floor. Friendly host.

I just returned to Vietnam for the first time in 5 years, and this Airbnb truly made my trip memorable. The location is unbeatable â€” right in the Old Quarter and just a short walk to Hoan Kiem Lake. The area is full of life, with so many famous and delicious traditional food spots around every corner. It was exactly the atmosphere I had missed.
The apartment was clean, stylish, and very comfortable. Even though itâ€™s in the center of everything, it was surprisingly quiet at night, which I really appreciated after a long day out. The host was welcoming, responsive, and made sure I had everything I needed.
And honestly, for such a prime location, the price was more than reasonable. Itâ€™s rare to find a place that combines great location, comfort, and value so well.
Highly recommend this place if you want to experience the real Hanoi!

it was a great place, small studio in a city center, enough space though to stay for a while. Had an absolute lovely time here! The dinners were always delicious and a really mellow way to meet other people. The surroundings are everything you look for and the tranquility is tangible in every corner! Absolute recommendation!

Very nice place to stay outside the city. They prepare lovely food for dinner. The host is very helpful with arranging for your next bus or whatever you want to do.

The host helped arrange a tour in no time and also coordinated with my bus driver so that I would have a taxi available to get to the AirBnB at 3 am, he even coordinated at that time with the bus driver although arrangements had been made at 7 pm in the evening! Much appreciated!

If you ever go to Ha Giang donâ€™t bother staying in the city centre and stay at The Anhâ€™s. Itâ€™s quiet, there are beautiful views overseeing the river, friendly staff and great food (breakfast pankackes!!).

A great experience from start to finish! An's House is in a quiet location and you have a great view of the mountains and fields.

Anâ€™s House is an amazing place to stay. Itâ€™s centrally located in Ha Giang, yet surrounded by nature, offering the best of both worlds. The cottages are exceptionally clean and beautifully decorated, making it the best accommodation Iâ€™ve stayed at in this area during the past week.

It's an okay place to spend a night before or after you do Ha Giang loop. Be careful, the location is not what's shown on Airbnb, and will be a bit of a walk from pretty much everything. The room is nice though!

Huyenâ€™s place is lovely and she is the loveliest host! Incredibly kind.

Had a very strange experience at this air bnb/hotel. At 10:45 pm (shortly after arriving) we tried to leave to grab dinner (we had just gotten off a 7 hour bus from Hanoi and were hungry). We realized the hotel's front gate had been locked! We were locked in!! After contacting the host, a young woman appeared who tried to talk us out of leaving, saying she has class early in the morning. After stressing we needed to eat something, she told us we must be back by 12. We said we'd do our best. She finally unlocked the gate, and said regardless if we've returned or not, she will lock the front gate at 1.  Never before have I been given a curfew at an airbnb or hotel before!! Very strange and uncomfortable experience.

Superbe homestay avec beaucoup de charme. Les chambres sont grandes et les lits trÃ¨s confortables. Huyen et sa famille ont Ã©tÃ© trÃ¨s accueillants et nous avons louÃ© nos motos avec elle pour faire la loop. Nous y avons Ã©galement sÃ©journÃ© Ã  la fin du parcours.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Huyen. She was proactive from the start, helping us book transportation from Sapa to Ha Giang. Once we were there, she helped us arrange a loop tour via car and we had an awesome time with our local guide and driver! We chose the 4D3N option and would highly recommend this, the second half of the loop has the most incredible views. We also did some trekking, visit local villages and businesses during our loop! We tried her pizza, which was delicious and were even treated with some of her other cooking - amazing tofu dish, sweet potato, stir fried mushroom and salad. If this is on offer, do not pass on it! It has was one of our favourite meals thus far during our months of travel. She suggested and booked us massages on our final night too, which was just the cherry on top. Staying with Huyen was beyond expectations. The hotel is lovely and peaceful. Ha Giang is more than just a motorbike loop, do not hesitate to visit and explore the region!
Huyen ist eine tolle Gastgeberin und Ã¤uÃŸerst freundlich! Sie war sehr hilfsbereit und hat uns Roller zum mieten angeboten. Die Zimmer sind modern und sehr sauber. Wir kommen definitiv zurÃ¼ck!
Nice room, a bit pricey for the room. The western style food (pasta and pizza) was very expensive
Huyen and her family are incredibly sweet. They helped us with our pickup and drop off and with booking excursions for the loop. Felt right at home here.

We had a fantastic stay. Even before we arrived it was a 5-star experience. Huyen booked our transfer door-to-door from our Hanoi Airbnb right to her place!
We enjoyed home made pizza, delicious ginger tea, and banana pancakes.
There is a short hike up the hill behind the hotel to stretch your legs that we appreciated
We walked to town several times. It's maybe a 10 minute walk and very enjoyable. Easy to get to a small shop or find dinner if you're eating out of the hotel one night.
Huyen also booked us a 7-night tour around the Ha Giang loop by car.
A special shout-out to her daughter who was very helpful with recommendations, translating, and just generally a wonderful, friendly person and her husband who also assisted with planning. A great family!

The best place to stay in Ha Giang! Besides that the hotel is beautiful and feels like home, Ms. Huyen's service is beyond superb. She arranged everything for us from the bus to and from Hanoi, to a customized private car tour of the Ha Giang loop. Mr. Cong, the driver, is very kind and puts in the effort to make sure that we are enjoying and we are safe. He found ways to talk to us and tell us histories and facts about the places we visited. We learned a lot from him. He doesn't lack anything in service. And Ms. Huyen and her family are very welcoming and accommodating from start to finish. The food she prepared for us at breakfast (like banana pancake with honey) and dinner (her famous pizza) are very delicious. She and Mr. Cong made our visit to Vietnam very special indeed. They make us want to come back soon. Highly recommended! Thank you very much again!

Staying with Bikki and her family was one of my most memorable experiences in Vietnam. You won't find many homestays that are like this, perfect for travellers who are keen to visit a beautiful, off-the-beaten track area, and see a different way of life.

It's been a pleasure to guest in the Bikky's homestay, it was an experience in a real life in Vietnam to know  how they live, what they cook and how they work despite in this time the rice lands are dry and the tea harvest has to wait to the next month. Highly recommended for tea lowers and those people who seek hotel amenities should abstain. Bikky's family was very friendly with us and Bikky was always  looking out for us. A pleasant experience that we'll always have in our memory.

I arrived in the night and when I woke up I was amazed by the rich landscape, warm and kind people, delicious food, and peaceful atmosphere. Bikki is doing something really special by offering guests a chance to live in her village and follow the incredible cultural traditions of the Red Dao Tribe. It was truly an honor. We went on break-taking hikes in the jungle, swam in stunning waterfalls, made tea from ancient tea trees, learned about local artisanal goods (jewelry, clothing, paper, chopsticks), and encountered the rich plant medicine of the land. Bikki is so helpful with anything you need and will create an unforgettable experience for you. I am in love with this stay. I hope I can visit Bikki and her family again soon, they have become part of my heart <3

incontestablement le moment le plus agrÃ©able et le plus authentique de mon sÃ©jour au Vietnam ( 1 mois) . Partager le quotidien de Bikki et sa famille pendant 4 jours Ã©tait un vrai bonheur. Mon seul regret ne pas Ãªtre restÃ© plus longtemps .. j'y reviendrai sÃ»rement...

bich has been the best host we've ever stayed at. you really live with her and her family, eat together, sometimes help with cooking or else if you like. she did not once hesitate to include us in her life in the village and introduced us to festivities and customs of her culture. even though the accommodation is far outside of ha giang it is worth the travel! you can totally rely on bich's instructions how to get there, she will arrange everything for you. if you're standard is to sleep in hotels you should reconsider staying in bikki's jungle homestay but if you are interested in having an intense experience with local culture while being surrounded by beautiful nature you should definitely stay at bikki's!

We had a great time. Its a beautifull place up in the mountains far away from the busy life in the cities.
Bikki took us too many places and showed us wonderfull waterfalls. The food was the best we had in vietnam. We even caught our own fish by hand. If you want you can help bikki with the cooking and learn a lot of the vietnamese kitchen.
Fantastic homestay, we had an great time with an awesome dinner cooked by Bich's family.  ** Google maps directions are not correct.  Contact the host for proper directions

The accommodations was cozy and beautiful, reflecting the rich culture of the area. Each morning, we were treated to delicious meals made from locally sourced ingredientsâ€”Bikâ€™s cooking is truly a highlight! We enjoyed fresh herbs, vegetables, and meats, all bursting with flavor.
Exploring the nearby trails and listening to the sounds of nature was a perfect way to unwind. Bikâ€™s knowledge of the area added so much to our experience; she guided us through hidden gems and shared stories about her culture.
If youâ€™re looking for an authentic experience in Vietnam, this is it. I canâ€™t recommend Bikâ€™s homestay enough! We left with our hearts full and memories

Don't miss out on this place! After a long journey on our motorbike we felt so lucky to have found Anh's accommodation, it was simply perfect. They made me feel very welcome and always very very helpful.
My trip until then was complicated but they made everything seem so easy. Will recommend to all my friends.

This place was a highlight for our family on our three week travels through Vietnam. After we arrived on our very long sleeper bus ride (not recommended) we were escorted by the family to our peaceful room with a river view. An absolutely delicious local menu meal was served using all of their organic farmgrown vegetables and meat. They also had wonderful vegetarian food available too. They served a huge variety of food and some of the tastes were definitely new and delicious to our palette. We took the bikes for many rides through the neighbouring towns where the locals were quick to smile. A very beautiful and peaceful people where all of the families care about one another and live in close community. It was not hard to feel very much at home. The Homestay was a great refuge after our adventures to unwind and chill with a beer or refreshment. The local cashew nuts were incredible. We ate all of their supply and were gifted the last bag as we left.

The most magical place we stayed in Vietnam!
The bungalows perfectly combine authentic Vietnamese living with modern amenities - shower with hot water and good pressure, which is definitely not to be taken for granted in Vietnam.
The bungalow is situated above a stream, so throughout the day we enjoyed the soothing sound of flowing water.
Additionally, the internet connection was exceptionally stable and fast, which allowed us to work without interruptions.
Xoi is the perfect host - she helped us with everything we needed. When we weren't feeling well, she accompanied us to the nearest pharmacy and doctor.
She even arranged bus tickets for us, including personal communication with the bus driver to ensure we wouldn't miss anything. We had the privilege of dining with her and her wonderful family, enjoying authentic local food.
In short, an experience we will never forget.

Thank you so much to Xoi and the whole crew, 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

It is difficult to describe Ba Be quickly. However, my girlfriend and I found it...gorgeous. If you're contemplating whether to visit, well we can tell you it is probably the most memorable part of our trip.
Our stay with Mr. Son and his family was lovely - they go out of their way to make you feel at home, Mrs. Son is a wonderful cook and I strongly recommend her cooking - we ate dinner with them every night and it was some of the best food I ate in Vietnam. Otherwise, this is not a state of the art 5star hotel - it is a comfortable home. The aircon is good, wifi is good, there's hot water.
You can also ask Mr. Son to take you exploring the lake and visit several sites, he more or less goes at your pace, and the price is very reasonable. It's definitely worth it. There are also motorcycles available for rent, and the traffic is nothing like the cities, so you can confidently explore the area, which is another great adventure by itself. You will see farms, rivers, mountains, waterfalls. Ask Mr. Son or Mrs. Son for advice on where to explore and they will guide you.

I stayed for 4 nights and 5 days.  Thuan arranged a boat tour with other guests staying at the homestay.  The guests are very kind people, so they took care of me, who is not natural in English, and I had dinner with them, and it was a very pleasant experience. Thuan also introduced me to a professional local guide named Tuoi, so I could tour pac ngoi village and hua ma cave.  It was the most enjoyable time I had in Vietnam. Meals served at the homestay were plentiful. It was unfortunate that there was noisy during the day due to road construction near the homestay.  Also, it is easy to see the nearby area only by bicycle or motorcycle. Before making a reservation, the bicycle was said to be free, but when I went there, I had to pay 50k vnd to rent it for a day.  I wanted to go directly from the homestay to Noi Bai Airport, and I was grateful that the host responsibly booked the bus.  The nature around the homestay is very beautiful and peaceful, so I was able to heal.

Luan is such a great host. 10/10 would recommend anyone to stay at his place when you head to Ba Be. It was clean, spacious and the food was amazing as well.
Not only that, you can also arrange any kind of tours that youâ€™ll like and Luan will cater to your needs. He speaks great English therefore there was an easy communication between us!

Our stay was an absolute delight! The view from the room is worth it all on its own! But more Luan was a most kind and helpful host. He went out of his way to make our stay enjoyable and arrange activities for us even though it overlapped with a local holiday. He took time to talk with us and explain about local customs and the holiday. The lake is a quick motorbike ride and we enjoyed kayaking and a boat trip he arranged for us. I would highly recommend! He also has excellent English so if you donâ€™t speak Vietnamese there wonâ€™t be an issue.

We had a nice time at Ba Be Legend Hotel. Luan is a very communicative, friendly and helpful host who speaks good English. He organized arrival & departure for us and had suggestions what to do in the area. For example, he organized a boat trip to cave and waterfall for us.
In Ba Be and the surrounding area, it is probably recommended to be able to drive a motorcycle, otherwise you are very tied to the hotel area (by foot you can reach small shops and do some hiking / walking) or you have to make "supervised" day trips. A tour to the national park costs 30-60$ / person depending on the type of activity.
Luans wife, Nhi, cooked us tastefull and extensive vegetarian dinner for around 8$ per person, even though we were partly the only guests there.
The room was clean and spacious, just the couch lacked a bit of comfort. So we would recommend this accommodation for people who are mobile and on the search for outdoor activities or as a stopover on a trip through the north.

A lovely clean hotel situated opposite rice paddies with views of the mountains. The hotel is excellent value and I couldn't find fault in anything.  The food is all home cooked local cuisine and you will not go hungry. There is plenty of food for breakfast and dinner.  What made the visit special was Luan's warm and welcoming manner.  He arranged my tour on the lake and advised me on a walk to take through local villages. I wish I had been able to stay longer.
The room was clean and comfortable with beautiful moutain view. We had a great time here. The host was wonderful with great tips to travel around. Thank you so much!

It is a great quiet place
Luan is full of attention with his guests
Thank you

The property was beautiful and Vi was lovely! She was so helpful with recommendations and accommodations. The stay was great, we had 3 nights here and it was so serene and calm. The bed was comfy, the coffee and tea were delicious, and the breakfast was so refreshing! I usually donâ€™t write reviews, but this spot earned its 5 stars!!

The location is great for a look around and the garden and room were unbelievably good. Our room was completely beautiful!
The ambience was divine and Vi was helpful with suggestions and transport.

Vi and the teamTrang, huyen, quynh each with their own roll at the homestay made the stay pleasant and comfortable, very peaceful place if you are wanting to just get away and relax or do some undisturbed work.

We chose to travel to Yen Bai when we discovered Vi's place and enjoyed a wonderful 4 nights stay there. The place is absolutely beautiful,  with a dreamy garden that looks stunning at sunset! Loved the fruit bowls at breakfast and the smoothies! Best coconut coffee I had while in Vietnam! Dinner was lovely too and we particularly loved eating on the terrace while the fire burnt close by. We recommend this little piece of heaven to anyone who's in the area.

As soon as you step in you can feel positive energy. Then you meet the smiley and welcoming face of Vi (who speaks english fluently) and the sweet kindness of Trang and you definetely fell in love with this place. The room is bright, spotlessy clean, with a big king size bed, free Wi-Fi, a big new bathroom, airconditioning (for cooling and heating), kettle, hair dryer and all necessary toiletries. Again you feel so welcomed, confortable and relaxed. They can provide meals, a laundry service on demand and free bikes to discover the city. This homestay is the essence of Vietnam itself: beauty of semplicity, recycling, honesty, welcome, respect for people and nature, artcraft, hard work, strong mind, joy and gratitude for life, positive energy, good food, friendship, relaxed mood, family values, wisdom. You enter as a guest, you (sadly) leave as a friend.

5/5 and better!
Vi is an amazing host, the food was superb and the whole vibe in this place was magic (beautiful cats). âœ¨ï¸

We stayed at Vi's towards the end of our trip in Vietnam and everything was just what we needed. Calm, quiet, relaxing, it's a little oasis in a busy strip. The room was perfect, comfy, super clean and private, we loved the yoghurt and fruit breakfast here we ate it 3 days in a row! Vi is super helpful, she arranged our transfers to and from, she helped us hire scooters to get around Yen Bai, helped us make a reservation for dinner, and answered all of my many questions. Very prompt, very good English, super kind - all of the staff here were really kind too.
The price was probably a bit higher than what we paid at other stays in Vietnam, but the quality was incredible, completely worth it in my opinion.
Oh and the cafe garden is home to a couple of very sweet kittens, we loved when they visited whilst we had coffee.
We will definitely return if we come back to Vietnam!

I only stayed for a short time, but it was truly a healing experience - both physically and emotionally.
The space is artistic, cozy, and full of character. Since the host is an artist, every corner of the home feels thoughtful and creative. The warm tones, combined with greenery and flowers around the house, create a peaceful atmosphere that feels both like a safe haven and a place deeply connected to nature.
The amenities were surprisingly complete and very well maintained. Everything was clean, neatly arranged, and far exceeded my expectations, especially for a home located in the city of Yen Bai.
What made the experience even more special was the host. I didnâ€™t feel like just a guest. I felt like a friend, or even a part of the family! Their kindness and sincerity made me feel right at home, and itâ€™s the kind of place that makes you want to come back again.

Our spirits felt restored after just one night, and we would love to stay longer on our next visit.

I recently stayed at a homestay in YÃªn BÃ¡i, and it was one of the most peaceful and memorable experiences Iâ€™ve had in Vietnam. From the moment I arrived, I was welcomed with warmth and genuine hospitality by the host family. They made me feel like more than a guest â€” I felt like part of their home.
The location is surrounded by lush green mountains and morning fog that gives the whole place a magical feel. Every morning, I woke up to the sound of birds, the scent of wood fire, and the fresh mountain air. The scenery is breathtaking â€” itâ€™s the kind of place where you just want to sit quietly, sip tea, and take in the beauty of nature.
The homestay itself was clean, cozy, and well-maintained. The wooden house has a traditional charm but is still comfortable, warm blankets, and even hot showers.
This place is perfect if youâ€™re looking to escape the city, connect with nature, and experience authentic local life. Itâ€™s not luxury â€” itâ€™s something better: real, grounded, and full of soul.

Itâ€™s a must to stay at Ai thiâ€™s home stay . He is very polite and helping about everything you need to do . He can suggest the best places to visit and see :) I had a wonderful time with him and his family . Definitely Iâ€™ll come back again in the near future!! Honestly, if I could give this place more stars I would. Thank you so much again for your bright and open minds, hearts and home! I highly recommend this accommodation if you are looking for a peaceful, friendly and loving environment.

This is a great place, really lovely family, the owner has perfect english, their place is really clean and open and the whole family welcomes you to their house, we spent 5 days at there place and it was perfect.
Food 20/10

This a wonderfully quiet, modern homestay about 15 km outside of city of Yen Bai.  Here you will find quiet mountains with trails and panoramic lookouts once you reach the top.  The host family is wonderful and will take care of you.  Don't miss this gem in the mountains!

This was the best Homestay in Vietnam so far! The host-family was super nice and gave us great advice on what we could do in the surrounding area. The near lake and the viewpoint completed the experience. Totally worth spending a couple of days here!

Anâ€™s place was perfect for a peaceful getaway. The area was quiet, and the house had plenty of spaces to relax both inside and outside, with a stunning garden. The house had all the necessary amenities, and I felt right at home. An was very easy to communicate with. I would highly recommend this place.

This Airbnb is an absolute gem! Homestay is fully equipped, spotless, and well cared!
The privacy is unbeatable. With a beautiful garden and no immediate neighbors, we could relax, laugh, and enjoy ourselves without worry. The peaceful atmosphere made it feel like a true retreat.
The location is perfect, away from noisy main roads, offering pure tranquility. And the kitchenâ€”wow! Spacious, airy, and perfect for cooking, especially with fresh organic vegetables from the garden and generous neighbors who share their delicious homegrown produce. The garden even has grapefruit and papaya trees, so we enjoyed fresh fruit straight from nature!
Finally, the host is beyond amazingâ€”100 out of 10! Incredibly kind, always available, and quick to help with anything.
If youâ€™re looking for a peaceful, well-equipped, and truly special place in Yen Bai, this is it. Weâ€™d absolutely stay again. Thank you for an unforgettable experience! â¤ï¸

An is friendly and very supportive host, highly reccommend!
Room is well decoration and fresh garden around.
Very nice house in Yen Bai with a beautiful garden, we enjoyed 10 days there - working remotely and exploring the Yen Bai city. New, clean and perfect for us. Host very helpful and responsive.

Outstanding stay. If you want non-tourist Vietnam this is it. A was extremely responsive and helped every step of the way with local recommendations, transportation, and setting up a tour of the nearby lake. Tons of fresh fruit and vegetables. Highly recommended!
Super good and responsive host! Definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to stay away from the hustle and bustle of the city.

I'm happy with my stay at Hillside Haven. The host was extremely friendly, resourceful and welcoming. Felt right at home in a peaceful and tranquil place, surrounded by flowers, plants and fruit trees, authentic Vietnamese home with modern touch. Walkable distance for shopping needs. Thank you for a memorial stay!

My family and I had a peaceful weekend at Hillside Haven. The house is cozy and comfortable, surrounded by green trees. We love the feeling of waking up to sunshine and birdsong all around.
Ms. An was one of the best hosts I have ever met. She has a peaceful and happy energy. She was always ready to help whenever we need.
We absolutely wanna come back here in the future.
Parfait, vous ne le regreterez pas.

We used this homestay like an in-between stop from Hanoi to Sa Pa. All I can say is I would highly recommend this location. The host is amazing, the food even better and the location at the lake is just wonderful. The host offered us a kayak to float around the lake. It was breathtaking. Furthermore the bungalow was perfectly clean, very modern and new.
This AirBnB is new, so don't be fooling yourself not to go here if you just read the lack of reviews. It's a hidden diamond! Go for it!

Recently constructed guesthouse in a heavenly location. Set right on the bank of a small lake, this spot is the quiet and peaceful getaway you need from the polluted, noisy Hanoi.
The rooms are well built with a modern standard, including a big TV, proper AC, and large windows letting in lots of light. Everything was clean and good as new.
The small rooms are on the ground floor and the views could have been nicer if the building was slightly nearer to the lake itself - climbing to the upper floors provides a proper vista.
The host, Dzung, was very friendly and welcoming, and it was enjoyable to hang out with him and learn about his life. He offers kayaking (free) and jetski rental (paid), as well as a dinner and breakfast made by his family.
All in all a wonderful place to stay with very few, if any, things to mind. Well worth the 3 hour trip from Hanoi, but slightly overpriced for Vietnamese standards.

Vi was a wonderful host! She would go above and a beyond to meet our enquiries and make our stay as pleasant as possible. Besides that, we appreciated the dedication in connecting with local people and networks in meeting our needs, such as organising bus rides, pickup taxis, and finding rain wear. The place was dreamy!
PS: the cinnamon scent in the rooms was amazing âœ¨âœ¨

Vi is a very friendly and open host. She was always reachable and helped us with everything we wanted to know. The room was clean and looked like the pictures. There is an AC so that you can set the room temperature you want. The bathroom is very nice. It has no windows and is therefore open.
The property is very beautiful and has many traditional details. It is very easy to relax with the calm music, the green surrounding and the lovely decoration.
There is also a small restaurant on the property where you can book good breakfast and dinner, as well as coffee and snacks for reasonable prices. We really enjoyed our stay. Thank you very much, Vi! We definitely recommend this accomodation :)

If you need a Rest and Clean your mind....go for here, If you are open minded come. If you like the food,the Tea and the Juice im Vietnam you are right here.
If you can accept that around this area are Humans which have to live and work ,you will be right in this place.
It's Not far Out, No sect and not a thousend year old monastery, Just a small Oasis where you can BE for a while.
when you are satisfied with a small fire and some tiny Lights in the trees at night, this IS where you should be some day.
If you want Party, loud music and loads of Flatrate alcohol, you will be disapointed-please stay away fro this place.
Thank you Vi for the warmth, the dialoges, your ears and your eyes......all that will stay

The rooms are spacious and neat. We were able to rest well and chill. The place are ideal for family but without seniors because there are about 250 steep walk from the mainroad. We enjoy the place because of the mountain view. This is better than booking a hotel if you'll be exploring Catcat and Fansipan and come back to rest. Wifi is good, and they provide dribking water, coffee, tea and rice crackers as soon as you need something in the morning. The host is very responsive and he booked us a private car service for the wholeday for 700dong only. We went to Cat Cat Ville, Alpine Coaster, and Moana. We will be back and book again

I've booked this place in last minutes for my group and it did not make me dissappointed.
It's very new place with good location. Just 5 minutes walk to the bus station adn about 10 minutes to the centre. The AC and hot water worked so well, and I loved the most balcony on the 2nd floor where I can have the nice view of the town and mountain.
They also prepared snacks, coffee, tea at the guests room which is so realxing with sofas.
It was tottaly worth the money!!
good rooms with good views on the top

Great place! Though a bit difficult to climb up to so probably not recommended if youâ€™re going with someone old or with mobility issues. But otherwise the house itself and the host is great!!!! Great view! We loved it so much

Mr and Mrs Transâ€™ place is worth every penny. It was at the center and within the  many restaurants. Very walkable. Also, the twin room that we booked was toooo big for the 2 of us. Very spacious and clean. I wish we couldve stayed a bit longer in Sa Pa. But we would def book this place again when in SaPa!

Amazing place to stay at the heart of sapa town. Walkable to everything but still quiet at night. Really good value and everything was perfect. Very comfortable bed and hot shower.  Host was lovely and easy to contact.

I had an amazing time at my stay I ended up booking another room with them for longer. They were super helpful and enjoyable to talk to. The room was clean and as described. I got amazing sleep. If I am ever in Sapa again, I would book my whole time with them!
We enjoyed our stay at this place. The host was very friendly and the trekking organised from this place was amazing. Great central location as well. Would definitely recommend.

Host knows English and thats a big plus. kindness of host made us fall in love with the city more.

Der Aufenthalt war sehr angenehm und der Beschreibung entsprechend:) Sie hatte uns bei unseren FreizeitaktivitÃ¤ten geholfen und uns alles erklÃ¤rt. Leider war die eine Seite meines Bettes schmutzig, aber sonst ein sauberes Zimmer und Unterkunft, in der man sich wohl fÃ¼hltâ˜ºï¸

We have a lovely stay here. The accommodation was perfect for us. Great family which helped us plan our stay in Sapa so we had the best time. Would highly recommend to anyone coming to Sapa.

We had a nice stay for the 2 nights. shame the weather didn't play nice but that was also what added a mystical element to the journey. tons of restaurants within walking distance. Hosts were super friendly and helpful.
if you like a firm bed then it's decent for the price. nice hot shower.

Super lovely place to stay in such a great location! It was not loud at night, but there was still lots to do!
Would definitely recommend

Absolutely great host and place to stay, felt so welcomed it was shame had to leave.
Excellent place highly recommend to anyone. Canâ€™t thank enough

Host is very friendly and the place is also clean and spacious.
Dieu Tran was an amazing host, made me feel like i'm at home. Definitely will stay at his if im back at Sapa. Thank you!

very pleasant stay

We had the most AMAZING stay!!! What a great start to our trip. The views outside our window were stunning.  The room was so nice and relaxing.  The area was great, so many shops , little cafes and restaurants.  It was easy to get a taxi to the city. The host was also incredibly helpful and they provide meal options which were great.  Would love to stay again.

We had an amazing stay! The hosts were super friendly and the rooms very clean. The beds were also really good. They helped us with booking the rice field trekking. Finally the breakfast was delicious. Would recommend!

Lovely place and the people too! Note that this place is around 8km from the city centre, but it id definitely worth it! I rented a motorbike so it's easy to go around the area too. Definitely recommending this to people who want to escape from the busy city life. Will stay here again soon!

Loved how clean the place was. But, hard a hard time finding the place because the address indicated in the airbnb wasnt really accurate. I also got lost when i was on my way back and received a text that the dogs around the neighbourhood are aggressive at night. There are really a lot of big dogs, and they come in packs too. There were also a lot of female locals who will run after you to sell their items. Beautiful view, but i didnt rly have a peaceful mind being here.

The Airbnb had a beautiful view, and everything went smoothly during our stay. The reception staff was incredibly helpful with everything we needed from hotel-related matters to arranging taxis, tours, and more. We truly loved our visit and would definitely recommend it!

The Airbnb was very nice and unique with a comfortable bed. The views were amazing making the stay completely worthwhile. The hosts were also very helpful. However, be aware that the stay is approximately a 15 minute drive from Sapa main town.

Absolutely loved my stay at s plus bungalow. Especially after staying in the heart of Sapa the last 3 days. Very peaceful, away from the busyness and traffic. Had water buffalos, horses, and baby ducks to watch right off of our side porch. Close to some yummy restaurants that are part of homestays.
Just what I needed, some peace and quiet. And the shower was nice and hot with great water pressure.

This accomodation located in ta van village that required 20-30
Minutes drives from main sapa. The road was worth it with beautiful view. Even when you reach this village everything is beautiful. Completely nature is what we are looking for.
The accomodation was perfect. The reception lady was speaking english well and helping us alot with what we need. Thanks alot to her that make our trip become more beautiful.

S Plus was a wonderful place overall. Location was about 20minutes drive from the sapa town, we only went to town once as there are many food options around the accommodation. This place is peaceful both in the day and night.
The rooms were clean and looks newly renovated, the aircon is cold and the heated water is a plus.
The staff running this place were the best ! they helped me arranged everything from the motorbike rental/taxi rides as well as trekking tours starting from my arrival to my departure.
If you are looking for a beautiful, clean and comfortable place away from the sapa town but still within reach, this is the place you are looking for.
Amazing staff that helped us whenever we needed to head to sapa town. Loved their breakfast too and not to mention the superb views! Recommend for people to stay here for a nice relaxing experience.

Die Reise hierhin war ein Highlight unseres Vietnam Urlaubs. Die Kommunikation ist sehr gut und schnell. Man kann bequem Ã¼ber die Rezeption alles organisieren. Von Touren bis Taxen ist alles mÃ¶glich. Die Bungalows sind wunderbar ausgestattet und haben einen tollen Blick in die spektakulÃ¤re Umgebung. Unbedingte Reiseempfehlung! Schnell und gÃ¼nstig mit dem Taxi oder Roller von sapa town erreichbar.

The host was very responsive and helpful. The place was serene and beautiful. The place is pretty far out from the town but it's easy to get taxi. Hoat and the team helps out a lot and patiently answers all the questions we throw at them at anytime. You will wake up to the most beautiful view.
Cabins have an amazing view of the surrounding rice fields. Peaceful place in a beautiful village. Host is very friendly and helpful

We stayed at S Bungalow during our trip to Sa Pa and absolutely fell in love with the place. The view of the rice fields was breathtaking.
The homestay was very clean, cozy, and had such a relaxing vibe. The host was incredibly accommodating, they even helped us book a taxi going to and from the homestay, which made our travel smoother. Plus, there was a free breakfast.
Itâ€™s a bit of a drive (around 30 minutes) from the main town of Sa Pa, so itâ€™s best suited for those looking for a peaceful escape rather than city convenience. There arenâ€™t many shops or restaurants nearby, but honestly, the tranquility and the warm hospitality made it all worth it.
Would definitely recommend this place for anyone wanting to unwind, be close to nature, and experience a more authentic side of Sa Pa. ğŸ’š
the place is the best. very beautiful and the staff are super nice!
great quiet place, great view of mountains and rice terraces
The place is very beautiful. The room is neat and clean, and the view from the balcony is stunning.

Der Aufenthalt in dem Bungalow war sehr schÃ¶n und entspannend. Wir hatten leider schlechtes Wetter in Sapa, aber dafÃ¼r war die Unterkunft perfekt! Durch die Klimaanlage, die auch als HeizkÃ¶rper funktioniert, hatte man es angenehm warm im Zimmer. Die Lage war super und der Blick wirklich sehr schÃ¶n, wir wÃ¼rden es definitiv weiterempfehlen!!
Lediglich die Lobby, wo man frÃ¼hstÃ¼ckt, ist bei kaltem Wetter ungemÃ¼tlich, da es dort genauso kalt ist wie drauÃŸen. Ebenfalls hat das warme Wasser fÃ¼r maximal 5 Minuten duschen gereicht, dann musste man wieder warten. Das war allerdings nicht schlimm und wir hatten eine wirklich schÃ¶ne Zeit in dem Bungalow!!

extremely serene place with a great view.
great place , host was proactive and very helpful ! a remote place with good little restaurants and nice people !!
It was a great place and host was very friendly and helpful guiding us directions. She also fetched us from the pick up.
Wonderful!!!
Great! Thank you:)

We had a great staying at Jungle! The place is beautiful with mountain view, breakfast included and they gave us a lot of local recommendations. A special thank to the young girl at the reception, because she spoke English and was always so kind and polite to us (sorry that I donâ€™t know how to write your name).
Nice stay overall, accommodation is comfortable and its surrounded by lush vegetation, it really gives a peaceful atmosphere. Host was very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay again.

very pleased with everything. location is near the town center, staff was great, the bungalow was cozy though the creaking of the trees the first night startled us ğŸ˜‚
We drove our pickup truck and the road is very narrow and steep. It was worrisome the first time up and down but after that it was no trouble ğŸ˜…

The cabin was spacious, bathroom was clean and has good hot water. Host was also very accommodating and helpful, we have big suitcases and had to walk a bit to reach our cabin, and they were very kind to help us with everything. They also offer free breakfast which was enough before we start our day. The surroundings were very peaceful but not too far from the city center. Overall a really nice stay.

Tien is one of the best host, Iâ€™ve come across during my travel. She is responsive, helpful and will make sure you are at ease and have what you need. Good recommendations as per the situation. We tried the dinner which was great, she even allowed us to use the kitchen for a quick brekkie. Would highly recommend anyone coming to Sapa to stay here. The rooms were spacious, neat and tidy just as shown in the pictures. Very near to Sapa market yet very peaceful and quiet.

Sapa Jungle Homestay is a beautiful place to relax high above the Sapa township. Basic but comfortable it offers a unique opportunity to blend in with nature yet still be only a 5 or 10 minute walk into the township.
Not for the light hearted, the 300 step climb is a bit of a workout, but itâ€™s well lit and stepped and not dangerous.
Iâ€™d recommend dining with the family to get a taste of the local foods for a very reasonable price.
Thoroughly recommend this place-

The place is great, surrounding nature. You can wake up outlooking the trees. Definitely for people who prefers some quiet and peace.
Host is very nice and accommodating. The staffs are also very lovely, especially Tien, sheâ€™s very friendly and willing to help. It was a great stay!

A beautiful place to stay at in Sapa. It reminds me of having my own treehouse but like on top of a mountain. The host is very responsive and fun to talk to. Ps: Give their menu a try and you will not disappoint!

Had a fairly good experience for an overnight stay. Location, as expected, near the wilderness and far from urbanisation, so expected less luxuries, like hot water and air-con. Impressed that there were 2 toilets, but discovered dead insects on the top floor. For hot shower, had to request owner to turn on hot water and wait 15min.

we reached very late at night but they were very helpful and responsive. throughout our stay they helped us transport wise and they provide free breakfast every morning. it was a really cozy and vibey place. the staff are super friendly and hospitable. would come back and stay again! 10/10!

loved our stay at Sapa jungle homestay.
great location close to town but far enough away to be peaceful.
The host was fantastic helped organise activities and had lots of great information.
we ended up staying extra nights.
The property is very charming and a bit rustic but with modern amenities.
We stayed with our 2 teenage sons and would definitely recommend staying at this wonderful property

This place made me say "i wish I could stay longer in Sa Pa". The place is lovely, and the host is friendly, kind and helpful. The loft is amazing with heated matters for the cold nights, it gives you the feeling of "cabin in the woods" but it's also very clean (spotless).
Overall perfect place to stay
Big bonus the doggos ğŸ¶ that are running around, especially the brown retriever ğŸ¥°

It was one of the best places I have ever stayed! We highly recommend the place as it is magical with a lovely staff and atmosphere.  Everything was great, the food, the drinks, especially the coffee, the view, the rooms and the location. We will choose it again and we are going to suggest it to our friends for sure.

Merci Jungle Homestay pour ce beau sÃ©jour. Je recommande vivement le bungalow qui offre un cadre paisible avec une vue sur la ville tout en Ã©tant au milieu des bambous. Mention spÃ©ciale pour notre hÃ´te qui nous a guidÃ© et vraiment aidÃ© pour confectionner un sÃ©jour satisfaisant nos envies dâ€™activitÃ©s (rÃ©servation de nos billet pour Fansipan, rÃ©servation dâ€™un trip dans les riziÃ¨res en motoâ€¦). Staying at Jungle was the most amazing one I haven't had for a while. I felt right at home, the team is always very responsive, taking good care of us, even with vegan food which's not yet very popular in Sapa. I regret not booking tours with Jungle, as we didn't know they provide it. Ask a lots of things about tours as they offer the most authentic ones, from nighting out to trekking with locals or riding motobikes onto Hoang Lien Mountains. Try at least one of their home-cooking dinners and don't forget to have some shots from local ethnic cultures :)
Hope to be back soon!
An amazing experience â€” by far our best one in Vietnam. From the delicious meals to the tips from the host and the cozy bungalow, everything was just perfect. We couldnâ€™t recommend it more!

Our stay at Jungle home stay was the most amazing experience we have ever had at an Airbnb. The team was amazing with their recommendations by setting up local taxis, trekking tours and giving recommendations for walking around. Furthermore they made one of the best dinners we had during our entire stay. We absolutely loved the space and the two little resident dogs running around truly made us feel right at home. We cannot recommend this place enough and would absolutely come back if we ever return to Sapa!

Absolutely wonderful stay! The host was fantasticâ€”always available, incredibly friendly, and made us feel right at home. The bed was super comfortable, and the location is perfect: close to the city yet surrounded by greenery. We highly recommend trying the meals prepared by the host; they were unbelievably delicious. We'd love to come back!

We really enjoyed our stay at Jungles Homestay and we would definitely return. The setting is lovely and is only a short walk from the city action but is a nice retreat room the city. Jungle is a lovely host and is very helpful as are the other staff. Breakfast was lovely in the lush green setting. The views are superb from the Cafe area.

The Sapa Jungle Homestay is a hidden oasis in the treetops of Sapa. It is an easy walk downhill to the town with lots of restaurants, bars and shops. Our host was friendly and spoke English and was available via Messaging for any questions. We had a Hot Pot dinner on the patio one night and it was delicious! For a rustic and beautiful stay in Sapa, I highly recommend Sapa Jungle Homestay. :)
We enjoyed staying here. looking forward to come back soon!! Thank you for being responsive and the room is top notch! We really enjoyed our vacation.

Wir haben unseren Aufenthalt bei Nga und ihrer liebevollen Familie sehr genossen - sie sind an Gastfreundlichkeit kaum zu Ã¼bertreffen! Ich wÃ¼rde auf jeden Fall eine Trekkingtour mit ihr empfehlen um die schÃ¶ne Natur dort zu entdecken, wir haben so viel Ã¼ber die Kultur und die Umgebung dort gelernt :) Wir kommen auf jeden Fall wieder um uns dort eine erholende Auszeit zu gÃ¶nnen ğŸ¥° Das Zimmer war auch top mit einer super Aussicht!

Nga is wonderful, and so is her homestay!! She really went out of her way to make sure I was comfortable and happy. ğŸ˜Š
- My room was very clean and had amazing views.
- I ate most of my meals here, all of which were very affordable and delicious. Nga provided generous portions with fresh ingredients.
- Nga booked a trekking tour for me. She asked me what I wanted to see/experience and organized just that (waterfalls for swimming, paths through bamboo forests, etc.).
- I met some of her family members during my stay, all of whom were warm and kind!
I'd recommend this homestay to anyone who wishes to have a memorable experience in Sapa!!
we really enjoyed our stay there, wish I had booked more days. Nga was so helpful and made wonderful meals for us. We plan to go back in the future.

Nga is superwoman! She is adorable and extremely polite. She helped us with EVERYTHING.
> Planning my itinerary week before my arrival.
> Picking me up in extreme rain conditions that too early morning.
> Providing delicious meals always.

The place is HEAVEN!
> The day I arrived it was raining which stopped in few hours.
> Next day cloudy.
> Next day sunshine.
I was lucky to see all three weather at Nga's place and believe me it was just outstanding. If you love nature, this place is all you need.
My favorite place on earth would be Nga's home.
I wish I hadn't booked my flight from Ha Noi to Da Nang before my arrival to Sa Pa else would have dropped my whole itinerary to LIVE here as much as I could. <3
My best regards to Nga & I hope to be back soon!

This place was nothing short of incredible! I had a bit of trouble finding it in the first place, but that was at 6am after a long bus ride - once I found it, I was in paradise.
This place has such an amazing atmosphere and surroundings. I felt right at home and felt creative as soon as I walked in and looked around. Thereâ€™s lots of open space and natural light.
100% recommend checking this place out.
I have the great time at this place. The host Ms. Yen is so friendly and the room was clean and pretty.
Amazing place for a retreat, Yen is a super host who can help you a lot. Rooms are clean with a large and comfy bed. The views are insane!!!

The place was better than the photos. The way to the homestay is rocky and you would need a taxi, grab, or green gsm or vinfast to get there. The place also has steep stairs when going around but it is all worth it for the view.
For the food, expect regular home cooking. We found it really good though

This is hands down the most beautiful place Iâ€™ve ever stayed in, the views are breathtaking. The host was lovely and made us feel right at home and always messaged to see how we were. Just be warned to drive is a little bumpyğŸ˜‚ however we had no problems with grabs getting there! Will 100% be staying there again <3
I had great stay at this homestay.the views are absolutely spectacular.The host was really kind & helpful.Overall its a Wonderful place to stay even quite far from town and the road a little bumpy..

Hoang Haiâ€™s place is definitely worth the money if youâ€™re looking for a peaceful time in nature. It was a perfect day for us to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. We loved the beautiful view, and the host was very friendly and responsive. We ordered pho from the on-site restaurant, and it was delicious! The staff were helpful and welcoming. I would definitely recommend this place. It was a lovely part of my Sapa trip.
Good views, reasonable prices, friendly staff, delicious meals were good, and the location was in the mountains. It is a satisfactory accommodation as a whole and goes well.

Unique, comfortable and a very relaxing spot away from everything. The rounded hut was spacious, had a nice shower and comfortable bed with your own balcony too. The view was stunning when you got it (Quite foggy when we went). The hut is located in a resort with a few different huts and the area is beautifully managed and feels private. The only downside is the location which is remote and away from the main attractions, Sa Pa and restaurants. Harder to get taxi/grabs because the road is pretty bumpy/bad to navigate as you'll find out. Hosts were very helpful and have a small menu for breakfast and dinner with veggie options. Thank you for letting us stay
I had a wonderful stay at here. The view was absolutely stunning. Waking up to that view was a real highlight of the stay. Would definitely stay again if Iâ€™m back in Sapa!

Deep in the countryside, but spoiled with stunning views. The road to get there is quite challenging. Itâ€™s fine during the day, but at night, going out is nearly impossible. Even Grab drivers wonâ€™t accept rides because itâ€™s too far from the city . Overall its worth it with the view and price ğŸ¥°
We had the pleasure experience of staying at Rock Garden and were thoroughly impressed by the hospitality and service throughout our stay (the host was delivered our breakfast in a stormy morning).

Staff is very helpful. Food is good. Rooms are neat and clean.
Must recommended place.
Such a beautiful stay! Itâ€™s a bit secluded and a bit far from Sapa town, but the view is unbeatable. We even can hear the birds singing and crickets chipping. Will surely come back.

This was one of the most stunning air BnB experiences weâ€™ve had! The views from this place are sublime. We loved watching the mountains as they changed through the day. We were sad to leave - what a memorable experience!

We had an incredible stay! it was rainy and cloudy when we arrived, but the view cleared up with the sunrise each morning. Place with an Amazing view!
