We brought our own food and ordered white rice & omelette from the kitchen as they didnâ€™t have halal option. But they accommodated our request and even advised us which of their breakfast menu contained pork/meat. Nice stay to just chill. We took the recommended taxi and as expected the ride was pretty rough but Iâ€™d say it was worth a stay for one night.
The roundhouse offered a beautiful mountain view of the the village below. It felt like looking at a widescreen tv and a breathtaking view of the surroundings and nature
I enjoyed the magnificent view during my stay, the weather was great. Itâ€™s worth to stay here and very rocemmended. The host is friendly and helpful too.

Iâ€™ve stayed here a couple of times now and always love coming back. The view is absolutely stunning, perfect for a relaxing getaway in Sapa. Just a heads-up: there are some stairs to reach the room

The place was amazing and the views were exactly like what was shown in the listing. The host spoke English and was a very kind and helpful person. He even arranged a cab for us at a very reasonable price. We were pleasantly surprised at the included breakfast.
The only con I had with the place was that it was a bit dusty. The room could have been maintained a little better.

We had the most incredible stay here. The location provided amazing views and a peaceful environment. Pavi was extremely kind and helpful, giving us plenty of recommendations and making sure we were always comfortable.
The food was made to order and was fantastic. We visited Pavi garden too, which again gave great views and food. I cannot recommend enough!!

amazing place to stay at. great locals, paviâ€™s food was amazing. motorcycle rental services and laundry services were really convenient. dogs and cat were really friendly. overall really amazing stay. thank you so much!
Pavi's Homestay is very peaceful and has a breathtaking view. The Host was very friendly and helpful. Had a great stay there.

The breakfast was amazing and the view also (if it wasnâ€™t foggy). The host was always so polite and chatty, recommending us things and telling us more things about Sapa :D I will always remember his hospitality and the conversation I had with him â€” definitely recommend this place if you need a local stay with nice people and nature!! Super clean, comfortable and welcoming!!

It was a wonderful way to connect with the local culture. Pavi and the guy who runs the inn are extremely kind. The weather was bad and it was cold outside, but my room was very warm. There were some mosquitoes, and they immediately helped me with mosquito coils. Of course, itâ€™s a very simple place, where you might find some insects (itâ€™s right in the middle of the rice fields), but the view in the morning as soon as you wake up is truly refreshing.
I highly recommend it!

Host was very responsive, helpful and friendly throughout the stay. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Pavi Home. Amazing view and vibes. Special shoutout to the dogs and cats roaming the home. Slightly further from city centre but the serene and peaceful views more than make up for the distance. Will definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a homestay with great views!

Must VISIT . Amazing stunning view and the best part Was doggos there more than 10 - 15 including puppies â¤ï¸
Definitely for a pet parent ğŸ˜
Nothing to say, dep vai lon, thats what my friends said. Send love to aunt May and sister Dinh. We will miss you, alot

Nous avons Ã©tÃ© Ã©chantÃ©s de notre sÃ©jour. TrÃ¨s bien reÃ§u, hÃ´te trÃ¨s rÃ©actif et gentil ainsi que sa famille.
Endroit paisible avec vue sur les montagnes dont on ne se lasse pas !
Les chiens et le chat sont trÃ¨s mignons et participent Ã  la douceur du sÃ©jour.
Nous recommandons fortement !

Chambre Ã  la hauteur de nos attentes, ras sur ce point.
par contre gros bÃ©mol sur l'emplacement qui est Ã  30 min du centre de Sapa, ducoup Ã§a vous coÃ»te environ 17â‚¬ aller/retour par jours, ce qui fait grimper le prix de la chambre et donc est a prendre en compte !

If you want to relax and unwind in Sapa this is the place to go. Also they offer Trekking adventure with a local guide, you will see spectacular views of mountains.  Jack the manager is very helpful and attentive to our needs. If you want to go to the city, heâ€™ll arrange a transport for you. Also he prepares a good dinner bbq and hotpot as well!

Beautiful homestay about 30 minutes from Sapa town. We loved spending time with the sweet dogs and cats on the propertyâ€”they were super friendly and always up for cuddles! The manager was very accommodating and quickly helped us switch to a room with air conditioning when we realized our initial room didnâ€™t have it. Overall, a lovely and welcoming stay! Would highly recommend ordering the barbeque set for dinner. It was such a great experience.

Had a very pleasant time at Pavi House. Great location with serene and nice view surrounded by the hills and rice fields.
Host was very responsive and helpful. They also accomodate the pickup services to/from sapa city center.
Not forget to mention how are we having a good time for being able to play with Pavi Houseâ€™s dogs and cat! â¤ï¸ğŸ¥°
Great customer review, very friendly with us, great accommodations and very scenic views
Super lieber Besitzer, war immer erreichbar und hat mir sehr weiter geholfen. Ich komme gerne wieder.

Staying at Pavi Home was one of the best decisions made for this trip to Sapa. The view is amazing and the room was extremely cosy. The cute pets there are an added bonus! The location is slightly out of the way as itâ€™s in the mountains, but you can arrange a driver with the host Jack who is always responsive and helpful. He allowed us to check in early with a small fee, which was fine with us as we arrived at 6am and needed a space to freshen up.
Jack is also such a great chef and cooked amazing meals for us! He provides great tips on where to visit in Sapa, and facilitates private treks with the local Hmong villagers who are so kind and helpful.
Do note however that if youâ€™re visiting in Summer, bugs are inevitable. There were a few that flew in but Jack kindly fitted some door stoppers to block them out. They also helped to clean our room when we requested for it. Overall, we truly enjoyed our entire experience at the homestay and I would definitely stay at Pavi Home again!
We had a great time at Pavi, the breakfast and diner are fabulous. Do try the vegetable curry from Jack. Their hospitality is so good.
Very cozy place to stay, around 20 mins by car from Sa Pa center. Very good food, a lot of dogs and cats to play with. 10/10 would recommend

Though we visited Sapa during winter and the weather was terrible, Pavi's home warmed us up and made the whole experience awesome. Will miss this place and all its furry friends. Will definitely visit again. Do try out their painting workshop, it was amazing!

Pavi Home is an amazing place to rest, take a deep breath and enjoy the beautiful views! The place has amazing scenery and its hosts are so so so helpful and very accommodating. They helped us with everything and we pretty much used every suggestion. The rooms are very nicely designed with a huge window looking out to the mountains and ricefields. This offer is for people who love very authentic experiences - from the tea to the trekking with the local tour guide and herbal bath! We absolutely loved it and we want to come back in summer time next time ğŸ’• a big plus for the friendly dogs and cats ğŸ’•

Great host and beautiful tree house. We had dinner, which was delicious. Everything was very flexible, we arrived very early in the morning but the host offered us breakfast. We could also check in early and store our luggage. Would definitely recommend this place if you are planning on visiting sapa!

The accommodation offers a quiet retreat from the often lively and noisy Sapa City. Nevertheless, the center can be reached quickly and easily on foot. You can also simply hire a scooter from the accommodation. The host of the accommodation is always friendly and incredibly accommodating. It made our stay even sweeter. The accommodation is a clear recommendation for Sapa, especially if you want to stay in the "jungle".

What a great stay and service! The homestay is a gem, the trees surrounding the place give a very relaxing atmosphere. Beautiful and clean room. The highlight of the stay was the host, communication was amazing and the lady was beyond helpful, answering every question and providing everything we need, including activity bookings. would definitely recommend!

We had a great time at this Jungle Homestay! The view was incredible, and it was tucked away from the noise of the city without being a far walk. The room was clean and comfortable, and came with a mosquito net for bugs. Bathroom had real shampoo, and lots of extras in case you forgot anything.
Our Host was very welcoming and responsive, and helped us book a cheap cab when we left. Cheap scooter rentals as well! The homemade meals were some of the best we have had on our trip so far. 10/10 would stay here again!

absolutely beautiful place to stay.
Amazing views and such good value for money.
Everybody was welcoming, extremely friendly and very very helpful.
I can't recommend this place enough, it's truly wonderful!!
fantastic hosts!!

This was a little treasure in Sapa, nestled on the hill overlooking the city surrounded by trees and lush nature. The staff were friendly and kind and the space was spectacular. The only downside is the town square plays loud music until around 10pm at night, but afterwards it is peaceful and quiet. A lovely stay for a couple especially if you prefer being out of the main part of the city ğŸŒ¿âœ¨

Stayed here for two nights and were amazed by the treatment we received from the workers. They provided photos and map directions on how to get there by foot or by car. We were given an electric blanket and heater as it got cold at night. Any questions or concerns we had they were easily answered and taken care of for us! This is a great place to unwind and take in the beautiful views of Sapa, so highly recommend booking here for your travels ğŸ˜Š

A beautiful unique treehouse experience.
Fantastic location as the views were amazing and it was slightly away from the noise of the city.
Min was a delightful host and super helpful organising a tour and tickets for me.
All meals at the home were lovely and very generous.
I would highly recommend a stay here.

The tree house was a novelty experience. Unfortunately the weather was very poor and did impact the quality of our experience but i imagine that its fantastic when the weather is clear and you can enjoy the view and surroundings. Our host was friendly and it is nice that they include breakfast which we got to enjoy by the fire in the common room. Id like to stay again.

We had such a beautiful, magical stay here and loved our little jungle home!!! It was so sweet and cosy. Loved the familial atmosphere, everyone from all walks off like from all over the world gathering and hanging out together in the common spaces. The hosts were so accommodating and amazing chefs! And the DOGS and little kitty. So damn cute, I fell in love! Definitely wanted to take them home with me ğŸ˜‚ Overall a wonderful place and had a really lovely stay.

Our stay was wonderful. We were able to contact the hosts before our arrival and receive all the information we needed. The team was super friendly and helpful at all times. We can also highly recommend the dinner. The treehouse offers a great view and you really feel like you're in the jungle.

Wir hatten einen exzellenten Aufenthalt. Das Personal ist super freundlich und hat fÃ¼r uns eine Wandertour gebucht, die ich nur empfehlen kann. auch sonst wurden wir bei allem weiteren sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit unterstÃ¼tz und konnten unser GepÃ¤ck sowohl als auch nach Check-in/Check-out dort lassen. die BaumhÃ¤user haben einen super Ausblick Ã¼ber die Stadt und Berge. ich kann das Sapa Jungle jedem nur empfehlen
Cool place to stay amongst the trees! Staff were friendly and it was a short walk or bike into town. Only downside was after a cold rainy night, the floor inside was very wet. :)

I really enjoyed my stay! It was remote, comfortable with beautiful views of Sapa from the balcony. My only complaint was that it was a little noisy from other guests outside the room and coffee table want included with breakfast. I didnâ€™t find that out until after when I was charged for it

stupenda location!! siamo rimasti una sola notte ma la nostra host Ã¨ stata meravigliosa, una persona dolcissima che ho apprezzato per la presenza costante, la disponibilitÃ  ad aiutarmi a prenotare sia il trekking ( bellissimo) che lo sleep bus per ripartire.
non posso che consigliare vivamente di soggiornare qui!

A very unique experience to sleep in a treehouse. The hospitality of the host - Tien is amazing. She will always help you get to your locations, and always greet you with a warm tea. The only downside is that if you come in winter it may be a bit cold. There is a portable heater and plenty of blankets available though. The walk up is a bit of a hike but I recommend this as a good point because it gets really noisy at night in the main streets and you wouldn't be able to rest properly there.

The team is incredibly kind and fun. Itâ€™s in a great location close to Sa Pa town, but still far enough away for a relaxing & peaceful stay. There are heaters for the cold months and the food is amazing!

Super sÃ©jour dans une jolie cabane . Nous sommes bercÃ©s par les grincements du bois dans la cabane . Câ€™est une expÃ©rience insolite . ( dâ€™ailleurs câ€™est assez sport pour y accÃ©dÃ© avec les valises )
Tous le personnel Ã©taient aux petits soins . Les activitÃ©s Ã©taient organisÃ©s Ã  lâ€™avance et jâ€™ai payÃ© Ã  la fin .
Sapa câ€™est magnifique et loger dans cette cabane Ã  rendu notre voyage exceptionnel.

We really enjoyed the stay, we loved the natural surroundings, friendly people and animals. They had a portable heater and a heated blanket, which helped us sleep really well and warm. Also, they had good options for complimentary breakfast. Very easy access for walking to Sapa's market. The host is very responsive and helpful.

We absolutely loved our stay here! The host was the most helpful host weâ€™ve ever had and was always available for any questions we had. We loved the inclusive breakfast and enjoyed our mornings with coffee on the balcony playing with all the animals. The surroundings were so quiet and peaceful yet so close to all the action in Sapa. Highly recommend staying here
Great homestay with probably the best view in Sapa. Amazing scenery with nice rooms facing Ta Van village and Fansipan. Huong was a very nice host. Very much recommended.

This has to have the BEST view of any homestay in Sapa and it gets the sun till late in the afternoon, stunning location and beautiful property.  Huong was an incredible host and gave us some brilliant recommendations, helped book us a guide for Fansipan, and let us check in late at night! She went above and beyond to make our stay memorable and it was massively appreciated!

The 4 of us stayed here for 1 night (wish it could've been longer).
Pro's
1. Host was responsive and accommodating
2. Stunning view of the river and mountain
3. Friendly and approachable staff
4. Affordable
Con's
1. 20mins away from the city center and no establishments nearby
2. Room and pillows had a smell not sure how to explain it
3. A bit difficult to book multiple rooms even though they have a total of 19 rooms
Overall, the place and people were nice. We definitely loved our stay. If you want a peaceful and quiet stay away from all the hustle and bustle of Sa Pa Center, this is a place you can go to.

We had an amazing stay at this beautiful homestay in Sa Pa! Everything from the room to the service exceeded our expectations. The views are absolutely breathtaking â€” especially from the pool, which overlooks the valley and makes for the perfect sunset spot. Sunrise is just as magical, with several viewpoints on the property that offer panoramic 360-degree views after just a short walk up a few stairs.
Our host, Hanna, was fantastic. She was incredibly responsive, super helpful, and speaks excellent English. She knows the area inside out and gave us great local tips that made our stay even more memorable.
We highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Sa Pa â€” peaceful, scenic, and welcoming in every way!

Amazing stay here, the rooms were spacious and super clean. The views were amazing and so was the fried rice! Huong made our stay so welcoming and even asked us to join their family party.
Slightly out of the touristy area but perfect for us.
Thanks a lot!
Holly

Thi was very responsive, and her brother was friendly and welcoming.
That said, there are a few things to note. The cleanliness of the bathroom and linens could be improved. The hotel is located about 30 minutes away (on foot) from the nearest good restaurants, and the walk involves quite a bit of climbing. To avoid walking along a busy road for an hour, we chose to have dinner at the hotel.
Dinner must be ordered in advance, and itâ€™s not possible to add dishes on the spot like in a regular restaurant. While the food was nice, itâ€™s tricky to know exactly how much youâ€™ll want to eat ahead of time.
After a few days, we moved to another accommodation in the heart of a village where we could easily walk to different restaurants â€” we personally preferred being closer to more dining options.
One unpleasant experience was being woken up by loud karaoke around 10:30 pm, which continued past 11:30 pm.
Nice place and rallye Nice view! I am delighted to have spent a short stay there. I recommend it for those who want to live in nature.
very nice homestay and nice view , highly recommend to stay here and enjoy the view every sunset or sunrise ğŸ©µğŸ‘ğŸ» i will come again see you
The stand out point of this place is the view, it was beautiful. the room was good and amenities like the pool were always accessable.

We had a great stay at the homestay, enjoyed every bit of it! The rooms were squeaky clean and special shout out to the host Huong who let us checkin early with a small fee and also upgraded us to villa room by taking just 100,000 dong per day! Although the airbnb mentioned kitchen in the list of amenities but let me tell you guys, no they do not have any kitchen.
But our host Huong was so kind to let me cook my baby food in her restaurant kitchen, again thanks to her.
Also, the swimming pool provides a spectacular view!! We had a fun time swimming in that beautiful surrounding, mountains and rice fields view was breathtaking!!

It was such a lovely perfect place to leave in.
What we loved:
- the view
- the view x2
- the rooms were big (they also have smaller rooms though, but with cheaper price)
- the beds were comfy
- there is a pool
- the roosters and koi fish and big swings (it is child friendly)
- they have massage and hot baths with herbs
- you are in the most beautiful part of Sa Pa
I donâ€™t see why someone would want yo stay in Sa Pa city, I tried it for 2 nights and I preferred to drive to spots I want to visit 15-20 min than stay in the city.
There are things that can be done better but nothing worth mentioning. It is a gem.
The breakfast can be less plain, maybe. Still the pancakes were nice
love this place and its view. The host was flexible with check in and time.

HÃ´te et personnels de lâ€™hÃ´tel trÃ¨s accueillant et agrÃ©ables !

Great place with awesome view! Room is clean and big, high recommended to everyone.
Love this place and definitely coming back in the future!

Rock Garden was so beautiful!!! It was exactly like the photos, very private and peaceful. The recommended taxi driver on the listing was awesome. He was a great, responsive driver, despite the 20 minute bumpy pothole drive from town to the homestay. The food was pretty good, lots of options for dinner and free breakfast. Overall fantastic place with incredible views and close to the town for a day trip.

Located just 20mins ride from city centre, be prepared for a bumpy ride.
View was incredible, we could see clouds drifting by.
Dinner menu was extensive and we got a bbq set for 2.
Only downside was a slightly mouldy toilet with 1-2 spider webs.
Other than that, highly recommended 5 star Airbnb ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸ

The place is exactly how the photos show! The views are absolutely stunning! Wait till about 4-5 pm for the best views (this is in June) There is a bathtub outdoors in addition to the bathroom attached to the room. I didn't expect the bathtub/shower outdoors to be functional but it functions perfectly well! We also absolutely loved the food at the restaurant attached to the property! Simple and hearty. The two girls who helped us wiyh the check in arw extremely helpful and kind. And the star of the place is Nana, the Alaskan malamute!

The accommodation has a very good view, exactly as shown in the picture. I like it very much. It is private and relaxing, but the journey may be a bit difficult. If I have a chance, I will go back again. â¤ï¸

Amazing host, amazing place. I had a wonderful time, Iâ€™m not a fan of anything that crawls or flies but it was worth it for the view and the peacefulness. She includes a bed net which was great. The food was amazing and you enjoy it with a breath taking view. 20/30 min drive to town, many shops and restaurants and nearby any excursions. Colder than Hanoi for sure, needed sweatpants and a sweater. I really enjoyed my stay here. And Hoang and her staff made sure I had everything I needed.

Wow what an incredible view! I donâ€™t think the photos do it justice. Even if there is fog really cool watching it go past but we were lucky with how clear it was. The host was incredible, we had a minor issue and she was so understanding and helped straight away. The free breakfast was a nice touch and very yummy. If youâ€™re coming for a getaway in the mountains this is the perfect place! Not very close to much else but they have a restaurant. About 10 minutes drive from alpine rollercoaster and 30 mins from town. Such a lovely stay- thank you !!

We had such a splendid time staying at Hoang's place. It was such a serene experience; away from the hustle and bustle of the city. While it was around 30 minutes away from the city, the stay made it all worthwhile. The mesmerizing view coupled with friendly caretakers (and two adorable dogs) made the stay worthwhile. Highly recommend!

The staff were extremely friendly and the room was amazing! Such a picturesque view! Their recommendation for a taxi into town was much cheaper than others quoted and also extremely friendly. I would highly recommend staying here.

The road to the location was quite scary especially as we came during a very foggy day. The place was clean. They serve food for dinner. We ordered bbq set for 2 and they gave us a lot. I think it would be enough for 4 people. Would have been better of they also offered rice. Since it was foggy day, we did not see the view as expected. Nevertheless, we enjoyed our stay as it was very peaceful and relaxing there.

Une vue incroyable, Ã  couper le souffle vraiment ! LÃ  haut on se sent seul au monde.
Par contre, attention le logement est assez loin de Sapa et la route est trÃ¨s accidentÃ©e, peu de taxis ou grab acceptent de vous amenez jusqu'au logement...

Absolutely beautiful location - we were so lucky to have a clear day so we could admire the views from our room. The meals cooked by the host were some of the best weâ€™ve had in Vietnam. Unfortunately the outdoor bath didnâ€™t heat up and the infinity pool was filthy so we werenâ€™t able to swim at all

Amazing location and views stick around for early afternoon to get the best views. 12-2. The ride there and back is a bit far. At night the ride there is an experience for sure. Definitely great if you want to be away from it all with breathtaking views. 10/10

sometimes no hot water supply, this is the 1 point feel regretful. The paid worth for view and environment, nice place for relax and chill, if the main road to homestay can be more smooth this should be a very nice place

Really beautiful location. Not the easiest to get to because of the road conditions however we did decide to come during the rainy part or the year so all is expected. Very good food provided at the accommodation as well! Lots of friendly dogs too so always a bonus :)

Wow! We cannot recommend this place enough. Our jaws were on the floor as we walked in. Looks exactly like the pictures, and is even more incredible in person. Included breakfast was great, and we ordered dinner in our room. Tub is outside and is visible from other locations, so I'd recommend a swimming suit if you are to use it. We rented a motorbike in town and drove to the airbnb ourselves (though the host offers to arrange taxi pickup). It was a very adventurous drive, but if you are down for adventure, it was incredible. Be sure to set your directions to the "walking" path from Sa Pa, it will cut the drive in half (took us about 25 minutes, vs 45 on main road). The alpine slide is also on the drive, which is well worth the stop. Highly highly recommend, it's like Switzerland 2.0. Be warned, the doors do not seal fully on the bottom, so there were a couple creepy crawlies, but worth it for the views!

tempat best gilaaa! best place to stay! view? sangat cantikkkk! the view was so amazing!
breakfast so delicious. the staff was very nice and cute (LV girl) ğŸ˜†

The place had absolutely stunning views, no matter the weather. It was at the top of a mountain, and the room reflected that fact with some rock features, but that left a lot of homes for bugs. We spent a month in Vietnam, so bugs weren't surprising, but this place took it to a new level.  A mosquito net was provided. The pool was right above the room but was not maintained, so it was half full and a breeding ground for bugs, adding to the issue. It also wasn't the cleanest, with some hygiene concerns. There was mold due to the humidity. The place was also a long way from town, despite being only a couple of kilometers away. That is not the host's fault, and they had a kitchen that served fine food. It is important to note, in case you are like us and don't have a motorbike, that there was hardly anything besides one open restaurant within walking distance. The hosts were friendly and the property had plenty of photo area. It is the Rock Garden Homestay on Google.

Utsikten var bedre enn pÃ¥ bildene, og verten var veldig behjelpelig med alt fra bestilling av biletter til anbefalinger pÃ¥ fjellturer.
Det er en god del innsekter pÃ¥ rommet, og det kunne vÃ¦rt renere.
Totalt sett sÃ¥ anbefaler jeg denne plassen.

Hoang Hai's Rock Garden Stay in Sapa was a very picturesque and peaceful nature stay for our honeymoon.  Waking up to a sea of clouds covering the valley of terraces in Sapa was a priceless experience. The hosts were also very helpful in linking us up with transportation service from Hanoi to the AirBnB stay and to a local taxi driver to help us get back and forth from the Airbnb Stay to Sapa Town Proper. The road itself going to the Airbnb stay is a bit rocky but you could see the exciting developments around Sapa which reflects its boom as a tourist destination. The resident pets (cats and dogs) were also very friendly and made our stay more comfortable. Thank you once again to our hosts for a memorable stay!

TrÃ¨s bon sÃ©jour ! La vue Ã©tait Ã  couper le souffle. Le logement Ã©tait propre et correspondait totalement aux photos. Les repas proposÃ©s Ã©taient bons. Et le petit dÃ©jeuner inclus Ã©tait dÃ©licieux.

Die unterkunft war gemÃ¼tlich und schÃ¶n, bei gutem wetter gibt es eine tolle aussicht. Das personal war sehr liebevoll, zuvorkommend und freundlich. Die lage ist gut, jedoch sehr abseits vom zentrum. Das essen dort ist auch kÃ¶stlich.

A really central location, situated right in the Sapa Centre with walking distance to all the restaurants. Easy to navigate and there is a mart right beside if you need to stock up on snacks or essentials.
The accommodation is clean. Loved that the fridge is also stocked up with noodles, eggs and fresh fruits.
10/10 recommend.

The check in was easy and the apartment was very easy to find. The supermarket is within the building so very useful. The location is very central and there are lots of restaurants and cafes nearby. It is also perfect if you want to go up Fansipan.
The bathroom was nice and modern, however the rest of the apartment needed doing up slightly.
But overall, a great stay.

The apartment which we booked was small for our group. But the host was very co-operative and agreed to upgrade it at a reasonable price. The upgraded one was pretty spacious and clean. Location of the property is right in the centre you can easily walk around. Amazing experience

Our stay at this apartment was truly exceptional. The space was impeccably clean, stylishly decorated, and incredibly cozy, providing the perfect home away from home. The restaurants and apartments with beautiful lights were magical and were the best spots for photos. The location was idealâ€”quiet yet close to local markets and restaurants, allowing easy exploration. The host was warm, responsive, and attentive, ensuring a smooth check-in and offering helpful local tips. Modern amenities like fast Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchen added great convenience. This apartment exceeded all expectations, making our Sapa trip unforgettable. We highly recommend it to anyone visiting Sapa.

The accommodation fits perfectly for my family of 4. There was adequate space for everyone and a common area for us to mingle. There is hot water for shower and aircon in the room. The accommodation is very clean.
The accommodation is walking distance to the town square and convenient to get a grab. The host had provided welcome fruits and bottled water. There is also washing machine and dryer available in the building. Overall, it is a very pleasant stay! Cáº£m Æ¡n ráº¥t nhiá»u!

Fantastic stay here in Sa Pa. Beautiful apartment and the host went over and above to supply us with plenty of water, fresh fruit, jam and bread. Loved the layout of the apartment and everything was very clean. Step outside straight into the main square of Sa Pa

The location is very good, the apartment was cosy, everything you need for a trip. The price could be way better though, I felt I was overpaying.
They accepted me to check out later and to modify my trip with one night even 2 days before our arrival, that was great.
You have some basic things inside the house to make yourself a breakfast, super appreciated.
For everyone who really wants to stay in Sa Pa city (although I recommend just stay in the villages as it is way more beautiful) this is a good choise if you are a family (for a couple it is too big)

We cannot complain even about a single thing. We had at our disposal a very spacious apartment with two en suite bedrooms each of them for four people. There was a kitchen, dining room and laundry service available in the public space. Breakfast is included in the price and unlike other places in Vietnam there are ingredients to prepare something for yourself. We even had fresh pineapples. There is also an option to leave luggage in the lobby, which is extremely useful if you want to hike in the neighborhood of SaPa. Overall, great place, highly recommended.

Our stay surpassed all my expectations. The blend of exceptional service, comfortable accommodations, and a fantastic location makes it a must-visit. The room was spotless, spacious, and had all the amenities we needed. We especially loved the breathtaking view from my window, which enhanced my experience. The hotel's location is idealâ€”close to major attractions while still providing a tranquil atmosphere.

The place was absolutely awesome. Near to everything and every place that you want to visit. It is clean especially the bathroom is huge. It really feels like home inside. In regards with the host,the host is super responsive to all our queries and all the things that we needed. They even have some complementaries goodies for us. Overall our stay is really awesome.

Can request for bed linen changed if you are not satisfied ğŸ™‚
The apartment is big and feels like home.

We stayed here for 3 days and had a great experience, it rained the whole time but that didn't stop us from enjoying our stay. One of the highlights was how warmly we were welcomed despite arriving earlier than the standard check-in time, the staff accommodated us right away and even offered welcome food, major points for tired and slightly soggy travelers after a long trip.
This place is in a fantastic location just a short walk to Sapa Center and our unit has a clear view of the Sun Plaza. Even in the fog and rain, the misty views were stunning picture perfect.
The room was simple but clean and cozy, perfect for relaxing after exploring. The staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay, and the atmosphere felt peaceful.
Overall, Moc Studio gave us a comfortable, convenient, and laid back homey vibe in Sapa. Highly recommended, especially for travelers who appreciate good service and a great location!
Very satisfied! The apartment fully matches the description and pictures in the listing. The host was incredibly helpful and responsive. The apartment was very clean and perfectly prepared.

nothing bad to say. Location was great and host was responsive
Lovely apartment in great location. Minh was very responsive and helpful!
Lovely place in central Sapa. The apartment was well equipped with food, water and cooking equipment. Only downside was that hot water for the showers were limited.
The host is really friendly and supported all what I need. And he is communicates quickly! House is also spacious. But it's a shame that the house is humid.

Perfect spot and beautiful place! Service and communication was easy using Airbnbâ€™s chat. The kitchen had all the amenities you can wish for. The toilet was spacious and modern. Location was perfect, smack in the middle of town, without the noise and buzz.

I really love this place, great location, walking distance to sapa station and to everywhere.
Big room room with one double bed and 1 single bed + 1 room with 2 bunk bed. so its perfect for 5 adults
mini market is at down stairs, restaurants anc cafe is walking distance

Minh such very helpful owner, we did earlier check in because our bus was stopped in the early morning. and he pleased us to entry in the morning.. the place was very clean, easy to reach, and close with supermarket also sunplaza. see you in the next future

The apartment was beautiful and freshly appointed, very comfortable for a small family. The beds were very comfy and the AC worked great. It's located right in the heart of town so all the restaurants shops and spas are within easy walking distance. We couldn't recommend it more highly!

sangat dekat ke sapa center & danau sapa, memudhkan kita akses kemana-mana

Absolutely amazing. The most unique and beautiful homestay I have ever been to. We felt so welcomed, Maiâ€™s family was lovely and the food was the best of all our travels. Plus her home is so beautifully decorated. And the views are incredible. A highlight of our trip. Thank you so much Mai!
Oscar & Maggie

I am so glad I booked this homestay to gain a  real experience of what Sa Pa has to offer. Mai's family was very hospitable and catered for all our needs. The property is quiet and great to walk the area amongst beautiful scenery.  If you want to go into the main town it is easy and cheap to taxi in. We loved this place and highly recommend!

The family wasn't there as we'd hoped but the sister was a excellent host and very friendly with a warm smile. The kitten was very cute and playful. The weather was very cold with lots of cloud with no visibility, not the best time of year to be in the valley of sapa unfortunately, lucky there was a heated blanket.  Place was clean. Food was good. Overall wrong time to be there

It was a pleasure to stay in Maiâ€™s home , the house is even more beautiful in life , located in authentic viet village on the hills. Wooden house  With picturesque view clearly dip you in history , the details of the house amazed us , all house was made by Mai and her husband. And Mai is very friendly and nice person , always help us and support, also we ordered a dinner with wine , and it was very very delicious. We definitely recommend to stay in Chao Lao village instead of touristic SaPa. You will be amazed 100%!

I had the best time at Mai's home, ideally located up in the valley where the region gets the prettier, you will get to enjoy a cosy place to stay and a warm welcome from the family. Mai was really proactive in helping to get to the house, which can be tricky on your own, but it was the best place to go on hikes for the day and coming back felt like a haven. If you are looking for a getaway from the agitation, to have a rest to the sounds of nature, here is your go.

We had the most beautiful time at Maiâ€™s place - calming and relaxing. Mai is an amazing host - very responsive and helpful. In addition, she cooks the most amazing meals! Highly highly recommend. This was our favourite part of our trip to Vietnam

An incredible homestay in the countryside, maybe 30 minutes outside of Sa Pa. Thi (Mai's sister) was a great host! Very responsive, friendly, and had good suggestions for my stay there. On a clear day the scenery is breathtaking, and one could make an entire day just walking around the surrounding area. The place itself is quite nice with a rustic/authentic feel to it, yet with modern amenities. Highly recommended!

Mai ha sido una gran anfitriona, nos ha hecho sentir como en casa, ademÃ¡s la comida que hace es espectacular! El lugar es idÃ­lico, si lo que quieres es estar rodeado de naturaleza. Muchas gracias por acogernos Mai y familiaâ™¥ï¸
Un abrazo de Ariadna, Miquel y Raquel, os esperamos en Mallorca!

Here is a true Vietnamese guest house in surrounding SAPA away from all the noise and city life.  Beautiful lush surroundings.  The guest has is not fancy but appropriate for the area. This is the place to go if you want an experience.

During our stay, the place was covered in fog and we couldn't enjoy the view, but we had a wonderful time chatting with the people we met, playing cards, and doing origami. My 10-year-old son also loved it and is already saying he wants to go back. Thank you very much.

Hien was an excellent host. She was informative about all treks and day trips, accommodating and an excellent chef. The day after our mountain trek we relaxed above the clouds, sipping Maiâ€™s local wine.
Our stay was very relaxing. I will remember the many changing clouds and views forever.

We stayed at Maiâ€™s for 3 nights and it was exactly what we were looking for. Itâ€™s about 30mins outside of Sapa town and has some stunning views. It was peaceful, relaxing and made for a great base to explore. Mai and the ladies at the house were super helpful with organising tours and cooking the family dinners every night! Loved it!

We loved staying in Maiâ€™s beautiful guest house and sharing meals and conversations with her sister, Hien. Hien embodies benevolence and is a skilled chef and barista. Hien coordinated several taxis and cooked the best food we ate during our time in and around Sapa. Sadly, we didnâ€™t get to meet Mai and her family in person but Mai was still very supportive coordinating a motorbike rental and checking in on us from afar. If we stayed longer, we would have loved to also get to know SÃ´ (sp?), the Hmong maid, and hear her  perspectives. We connected with other homestay guests during some of the shared meals and in passing. The home and garden are tranquil and inspiring (organic architecture). We loved eating fresh produce from the garden and being able to practice some spring roll assembly. Meow-Meow the kitten was hilarious as sidekick and Bo (sp?) dog is a chiller. There is a 4 km hike down the slope to Ta Van. Taxi to Ta Van~ 45 min, 450k VND depending on weather and road conditi
this is a great place to stay, the scenery is beautiful. the host was amazing. they offer excellent home-cooked meals. will definitely want to return in the future :)

Lovely property in a remote and rustic location. Hien (property manager) was very friendly, responsive, flexible and hospitable. Had a couple of meals with them which was home made with good spread. Vegetables were from their home grown garden which was really nice. The cabin was quaint and the size was good enough for 2 people. Highly recommended.

Our stay at Maiâ€™s place was absolutely incredible. We felt right at home from the moment we arrived. Mai is so responsive, helpful & kind. HiÃªn is so sweet & welcoming. The home-cooked meal was delicious, and we had so much fun getting to know Mai and her beautiful family! Mai was also incredibly kind and helpful, particularly in arranging a car for us back to town to catch our bus. Highly recommend to anyone traveling to the area.

This is a really beautiful home. Would highly recommend to get a little out of Sapa town for some peace. We were looked after extremely well throughout, highly recommend.

This was the most beautiful place we stayed at during our 6day trip to Hanoi. The place was cozy, you could walk/hike to villages and surrounding paths. Host was extremely warm, we had amazing home cooked meals. Thank you!

Amazing host, super kind and helpful, such a lovely helpful person, amazing very helpful staff, feel at home and looked after, very beautiful, cosy and Homy, great food and service, thank you mai and her staffs for such lovely, supportive stay and help ğŸ™â¤ï¸

We had 3 peaceful days here. I had some of my best sleeps ever. It is a bit of a ride out of town but I loved the action on the road and watching children at play. I had a small mobility challenge so a bit difficult for me to move around but that was my issue. Hian was wonderfully helpful.

Had a great time at this beautiful bungalow. Stunning views from huge windows! A few insects in the room and bathroom but it's normal considering you're in the middle of nature. Other than that it was perfect. The staffs were super helpful and friendly. They even helped us with getting our rental motorbike and offered to store our luggages at Sapa Town after check-out for our convenience.  Thank you so much!

Wow! Our favourite stay throughout our three week trip in Vietnam. Definetly worth the money. The scenery matches the photos, the place was clean and the staff were always helpful. They even kept us up to date with weather conditions at least a week before we arrived. Opposite the bungalows is a taxi service which is easy to book through staff or Grab.

We only stayed for one night and im so thankful to Hue for helping decorate the bed just as I requested. She made our stay easy and comfortable  shes so kind and helpful, and the rest of the staff were also wonderful. The food was delicious everything was clean, and the view made our stay super relaxing. We will definitely be back again. THANKS AGAIN HUE â˜ºï¸

The cabin was located right in the heart of Ta Van, allowing us to experience what it was like to live among the Hâ€™mong. Sale and Cau were very welcoming and friendly, meeting us and helping us with our bags to where the taxi dropped us. The cabins were just like the photos, and it was great! We highly recommend the Bamboo Bar Restaurant near the cabins. We also availed of their trekking service, going around Ta Van. We were also able to purchase our Fansipan tickets here, saving us the trouble of lining up at Sun Plaza. 10/10 would recommend and book again.

We are extremely satisfied with our stay and the beautiful surroundings. The staff is so kind and accommodating, always doing their best to provide excellent service. The food was delicious and tasted homemade. The view was breathtaking. We spent a lot of time at the accommodation and truly enjoyed our stay.

Amazing location jn a village nearby Sa Pa - would highly recommend it for anyone in the area. Lovely host that arranges anything you ask for. You will not regret staying here

Had a great stay here! So (the receptionist) was really friendly and accommodating. The place offers breakfast and dinner at a really affordable price if you want, and they were always happy to help call a taxi for us â€” super convenient. You can choose to pay by card or cash, just let them know.
The place was peaceful, and they let us use the clean shower and toilet before check-in, which was a nice touch if your room isnâ€™t ready early. The only small downside was the dogs at night, but the latest we ever got back was around 9pm and luckily didnâ€™t run into any.
Would recommend this place if youâ€™re heading to Sapa and prefer a peaceful stay â€” just keep in mind the taxi fare is about 250,000 VND per trip.
Great place. very quiet and  beautiful landscapes. Nice bathroom and clean room. hosts were friendly and accommodating.

We were 2 nights here. It is a great place to get a feeling of rural Sapa. Unfortunately, we spent most of the time in the clouds so we couldnâ€™t really enjoy the view. The bungalows are 20 min to Sapa Town by taxi (which is the starting point for many activities). So make sure to bring enough cash for this.

This Airbnb situated in TÃ  Van village just outside of Sapa is absolutely beautiful, the view from the bungalow is worth everything. Our host was very helpful: from getting taxis (to and from the Airbnb) to offering other activities.
I would highly recommend going there if you want to escape busy Hanoi.
The bungalow itself is very cozy and clean.

Great place very peaceful and private,
Very friendly and responsive Host.
Nous avons adorÃ© ce logement, avec une vue splendide sur les riziÃ¨res. Le personnel est trÃ¨s accueillant et sympathique, nous recommandons.
Me and my girlfriend really enjoyed our stay. Really peaceful surroundings and beautiful mountains. Highly recommend going on trekking tour set up by the host.
Felt very peaceful and quiet. Far from town but the views of the terraces and surrounding nature were worth it. Friendliest locals/hosts.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Itâ€™s a little difficult to get to, however, our bags were taken to the homestay for us so there wasnâ€™t much of a hassle at all.
The hosts are all very friendly and were very helpful in booking tours, getting us to and from sapa town centre, very responsive over text at all times of the day, and also gave us fruit and coffee to go when we checked out. I had a few last minute requests which they were very helpful in accommodating.
Would definitely stay here again if weâ€™re in the area. Thank you!

The room exceeded my expectations - bedroom was clean and modern, bathroom also clean and had constant hot (not lukewarm) water, and view from the bedroom was beautiful. We stayed for only one night but I could have stayed for longer! Thank you for the lovely stay!
Great place by the border.

My friend and I had a wonderful stay at May's place. May and her family were welcoming, warm and and gave us the space we were comfortable with, it was a perfect balance. The internet speed was perfect for long zoom meetings. One of the highlights of our stay was the trekking tour we did with May and Sunmay.
As a digital nomand I travel a lot, and we both felt like this place was unique and really worth it.

Hi May place is perfectly as described
It is in a very natural setting and in a proper village area where you can get authentic Vietnamese local feel .
Just a suggestion go by the driver suggested by May as place is 14 Kms from Sapa town and last stretch of 2 Kms has very narrow roads
Avoid coming back late at night as light is little low because of village setting in a natural area

Thanks May, Cao and family for the hospitality! This homestay experience was definitely the highlight of the trip, perfect for short escape from hectic city life. The place was clean and comfortable. The home cook with self grown rice was simple but delicious. Not to forget the trekking around villages for stunning rice fields panoramic view. Would like to come back again with better weather/ season.

Vi boede et par dage hos May og hendes fantastiske familie. Vi fÃ¸lte os hjemme hos dem. Deres sted ligger sÃ¥ smukt i en lille landsby langt vÃ¦k fra travlhed og turister. Omgivelserne er sÃ¥ smukke og turene med May er helt fantastiske. I mÃ¥ ikke snyde jer selv for at opleve dette smukke sted og den sÃ¸deste familie!

May en familie zijn fantastische gastheren. We maakten deel uit van de familie, ze kookten lekker en elke dag anders. Na het koken aten we samen en vertelden ze over het leven bij hen. We hebben 2 dagtochten gedaan, een mooie wandeling tussen de rijstvelden en een motortrektocht, met May en familie als gids.
De bungalow was super rustig en had goede bedden.
Her was een hele mooie tijd en de 3 nachten waren veel te kort...

Thank you so much for treating our family like yours. Your property is amazing, and food is delicious. We loved the motorbike tour and of course June!!!! We will always remember the happy happy bungalow of happiness!

We had a wonderful stay at Mayâ€™s home. It was a wonderful authentic experience to stay with this warm and friendly family . From the engaging conversation to the delicious food , a shared love of dogs as pets and very comfortable private room . We felt welcomed as part of the family and nothing was too much trouble for them from washing , trekking, motorbike tours , herbal bath and all extremely good value for money. Thank you May and the whole family - we had the best time !!

May (and the accommodation) was absolutely great. Our young kids plaid all day with the animals and when we left they asked: why canâ€™t we stay at this place the full holiday;-)
Great experience, great and lovely people! Simply lovely!

Our stay At Mayâ€™s homestead was wonderful! We experienced such rich hospitality and had all of our needs met! The homestay had everything we needed! We would highly recommend adding in the lunch and dinners to your stay! Such a wonderful experience!  The 1/2 day trek, and motorbike tour were phenomenal! It gave you a very up close experience with the stunning landscape all around! May was super helpful in helping us make all our connections to get to her village! If you stay with May, you will get one of the best experiences in Vietnam!

Máº©yâ€™s listing is in a serene and peaceful village near Sa Pa town. The warm hospitality of Máº©y and his family made our entire experience extremely wonderful. This is a great place to explore Sa Pa's rice fields and mountains and get familiar with the locals.  The host was extremely responsive and helped us in all possible ways.

Great stay at Mays place. Overall, I liked May and her family. Location is in a very secluded area (14 kms and 350k VND from/to Sapa town). Donâ€™t take a Grab/Taxi there and use Mays suggested drivers (as the drive up the mountain gets technical and is dangerous for the wrong type of car). Go there for the nature. Super clean room and surroundings. Washing machine and drying were available on premise. Overall, a really great experience (but preferably not in Winter when itâ€™s foggy and cold).

Notre voyage nâ€™aurait pas Ã©tÃ© le mÃªme sans ce passage de 2 nuits chez May et sa famille. Merci pour cette hospitalitÃ© et cette gentillesse qui vient du cÅ“ur. Merci de nous montrer votre mode de vie et de nous permettre dâ€™y prendre part. Quelle belle parenthÃ¨se que de venir chez vous et quel souvenir gravÃ© dans le cÅ“ur que de vous avoir rencontrÃ©. Ne changez jamais.
Chez May, câ€™est authentique mais câ€™est propre, câ€™est la nature mais câ€™est confortable. Et puis la cuisine de la famille de May est absolument divine.
Merci, Ã§a faut tous les hÃ´tels 5 Ã©toiles.

Câ€™est notre 1er sÃ©jour dans le nord du Vietnam, paysage magnifiques et environnement calme proche de la nature. May et sa famille sont trÃ¨s accueillant. Super expÃ©rience que je recommande !
Merci

Firstly, I want to say that May and her family are possibly the most genuinely friendly and helpful hosts I have ever met. They make you feel at home and part of their family from the very beginning. May speaks great English but prefers to communicate in writing through her son, Cao, who is super quick at answering any questions. He and his wife, Hoa, along with Mayâ€™s husband Seeo, obviously play a big part in making their guestsâ€™ stays so memorable. May took us walking to a beautiful waterfall in the hills and was always ready to answer our many questions about their life. We ate a lovely breakfast prepared by Cao and a wonderful dinner which the whole family took part in making! The only reservation I would have for some guests is that this is a somewhat remote location and the journey there covers some rough ground! 14 km on mountain roads, is not the same as on paved tarmac. May organised a very skilful driver for us but it was still a little hairy! Thank you for a wonderful visit!

We had a wonderful stay at Bungalow in Sa Pa! The host family was incredibly kind, caring, and made us feel like part of their home. The location is remote, and reaching it involves walking through rough and steep roads but the peaceful surroundings and fresh mountain air made it all worth it. The rooms were clean and cozy, with a spotless bathroom complete with toiletries, bidet, and hot shower. The food was delicious, and sharing meals with the family was a memorable experience. They also helped us book taxis, buy things we needed, and were super responsive in chat. Cao spoke great English and was very helpful! One thing to note: there are lots of barking dogs along the road which can be scary when walking to/from the house, but thankfully we werenâ€™t bitten. Well, we just looked at it as  part of the adventure! Overall, a truly heartwarming and relaxing stay. Weâ€™d love to come back!

I stayed for two nights, but when it was time to leave, I found myself wishing I could stay longer. This place is a perfect getaway from the city, surrounded by nature and friendly animals, offering a truly relaxing experience. I also had the pleasure of meeting wonderful friends, and we promised to meet again someday, somewhere. :) If I have the chance, I would definitely love to come back. Highly recommended for anyone looking to escape the hustle and enjoy some peace.

We had a great experience with May and her family .First impression was â€œWhere are we going â€œ because of wrong location but when we arrived and met Cao and May ,everything went perfect.Try everything that they recommend and will not regret!
A very kind and welcoming homestay. The room and bathroom were very clean. We would recommend the bike tour and herbal bath! The view from their home is beautiful in all weather.

We had such a great time at Mayâ€™s place. Unfortunately we could only spend one night, but were so glad we got to experience it instead of staying in Sa Pa town. Such a welcoming and friendly family, and the best food weâ€™ve tasted in Vietnam. Thank you for everything !

Had an incredible time at Mays, her and her family are incredible people and instantly made us feel welcome and pretty much made us feel apart of the family.
Amazing stay, highly recommend and I think I will be back!!!

May's place is the perfect location for someone who wants to get an authentic feel of the village life in Sa pa. We only did two nights and would definitely recommend a longer stay. The half day trek and herbal bath were both amazing experiences. Thank you May for being such an wonderful host! PS: The food was delicious
Máº©y and her family were very friendly, and the bungalow is truly secluded. Perfect for relaxing and enjoying nature in peace.

We feel very lucky about meeting with May's family.
We felt very welcome and had a great time staying there. Cao was very helpful with anything we needed.
We loved the place, lost at the end of the road, did not feel like over-touristy Sa Pa at all.
Be ready to be surrounded with chicken, cats, dogs, duck, pigs and buffalos.
We were incredibly lucky that we were here right at the time to pull the rice out of it's initial field, and replant it everywhere on the terraces. We saw the color of the hill change over one day.
Highly recommend if you want a true experience immersed with a Red Dao family.

Merveilleux sÃ©jour passÃ© chez May et sa famille ! ce fÃ»t une trÃ¨s belle expÃ©rience de partager avec eux de bons moments (randonnÃ©es en montagne, repas ). merci beaucoup pour leur accueil trÃ¨s chaleureux ğŸ¤©

Loved waking up with 180 degree views of the Sa Pa valley rice fields. All staff were incredibly helpful and sweet and quick to respond to messages. We would come back in a heartbeat. Only thing to note is that it is a bit difficult to carry heavy bags to the location as taxi drivers cannot drive all the way to the property. We rented a scooter through the host as well, which made it super easy to drive to and from Sa Pa town.

If you need a get away from the hot humid cities this is the place. The host was very responsive and she was really helpful when it came to local recommendations and check in/out. It is about 25 minutes outside from Sapa town so plan that when it comes to going into town. There is a local restaurants nearby that were all fantastic. Also with the environment the place is located in be prepared for lots of bugs and wildlife. Thank you for the stay it was much appreciated
Perfect location outside of Sapa town. Such a beautiful view, the room is comfortable, and the staff are very helpful and friendly!! Beautiful homestay, i definitely recommend! â¤ï¸

The bungalow was amazing and the view is absolutely breathtaking. The host is very responsive and kind. Hope to make our way back there again someday. You should definitely book your stay, you wonâ€™t regret it!

We loved this little spot outside the hustle and bustle of Sapa. It has a great view from the bungalow and they are so sweet! Breakfast was included which I hadnâ€™t realized so that was a nice surprise! The local vendors can be pushy, but just tell them no shopping or ignore them and youâ€™ll be sweet. Highly recommend this stay!

We had a great time at the Bungalow. The room was super clean and the bed was comfortable. The view from the room into the nature and the mountains was amazing. There are many restaurants nearby and it was easy to rent a motorbike. The staff helped us with that.
Just watch out for the barking neighborhood dogs at night. They scared us a little bit but didnâ€™t harm us.
Thanks for the great time. I highly recommend this place!
Het verblijf was heel erg fijn en zat lekker in een rustige omgeving. Het laken op het bed was niet helemaal schoon, maar voor de rest waren we zeer te spreken over het verblijf.

From the first day, we were welcomed with joyful energy and excitement from the hosts to ensure we had the best stay at S Plus! The room was beautiful with stunning views and clean amenities. During our stay we requested a cable car tour up to Fansipan, which the hosts booked for us and showed us a map to help the excursion be smooth and enjoyable! Communication from S Plus was quick, efficient, and friendly, we thoroughly enjoyed our time at S Plus and will be staying again in the future!
The breakfast in the morning was a great start to the day and the staff were always happy to help with extras (i.e. extra towels, toilet paper, etc).
Beautiful bungalow with a stunning view of the surrounding landscape. 25mins away from Sapa center by motorcycle. Could use some maintenance in the bathroom (bathtub and water drainage).

Had the most amazing time here at S Plus Bungalow . Peaceful and quaint location, serving really great coffee and food. Ruby and the team were such amazing hosts who ensured we had a great stay, we had easy transport anywhere we wanted to get to, helped us where ever we got stuck, and answered all our queries. A must stay!

Great place for calm and peaceful to rest.
The host makes you feel like going back to hometown with great hospitality.

Nous avons passÃ© un super sÃ©jour dans notre bungalow en plein milieu des riziÃ¨res !
Le paysage Ã©tait splendide et le service client Ã©tait parfait. Nous recommandons fortement Ã  toute personne souhaitant un logement tranquille et reposant !
Great place with beautiful view. The host was very pleasant and helpful. Would definitely stay here again.

Great place if you want to experience the village life! Clean and well maintained. Had restaurants nearby which are walkable and hosts were very helpful in arranging taxis to get to the accommodation. Quaint and nice vibes. However, during winter, heating can be improved. The room was not very well insulated so it couldnâ€™t keep warm.

The bungalow is located in a very beautiful place and the view from the window was stunning! It was the highlight of our trip. The communication with host and the crew was very good - responsive, friendly and caring. Thanks for the help and all advices.
What a fantastic stay! The bungalow in Ta Van offered breathtaking panoramic views of the rice terraces. It was truly beautiful and a memorable experience.

Our stay was wonderful! The place was beautiful and very peaceful.
Hoat was an incredible host, extremely attentive, friendly and flexible!
Highly recommend!

We had a great time at the S Plus Bungalow. Very peaceful and nice village vibes.
A bit further out of Sapa town then we had anticipated but was no issue. Our hosts were very helpful, being able to organise taxis on our behalf.
Fantastic place, superb front desk ladies which were always helpful, away from the clutter of sapa town tucked in a local village. Breakfast provided was fantastic, one of the better stays

If I couldâ€™ve extended my stay I wouldâ€™ve! This place was amazing! It was peaceful and the host was extremely helpful with everything we needed help with. Views were also super amazing. I highly recommend booking the taxi from Sapa town to their homestay with the host. itâ€™s convenient as the taxi drivers know exactly how to get to the homestay ! They were also really helpful with our luggage. I only have great things to say about the room, host and all the staff in this place ! I also highly recommend booking an incense making tour with the suggestion from the host. (: and there is an amazing French restaurant near the air bnb called hmong sisters ta van. The cold cuts there are great!
very flexible host, possible to leave the luggage before the check in, the proposed treck is also pretty good, and the beds and bathroom were very clean. would definitely stay there again!

It was a wonderful stay at Dieu's place. he was really firemdly and helpful. The room and the toilet were really clean. A thick blanket was provided which really hepled stay warm at night. Really affordable too. I enjoyed the stay very much.
It was a great stay , the room and the bathroom are clean. The host is really rÃ©active and ready for help anything. I recommend this Homestay!

I had a great time staying at this place.
The host was very friendly and could speak English which was very helpful in our communication. His personal recommendation for activities to do in Sapa and the local eateries were all spot-on and excellent. I also love his cat, Chicken, who adds to the charm and friendly atmosphere of the place.
The common room is also very nicely set up with comfortable armchairs and clean bathrooms for all the guests living in the dormitories.

Really like the accommodation. It has a big and quiet terrace with an amazing view. Itâ€™s a little outside the center, but not to far, something I like.
Dorms were really simple but clean. Good quality for money

Staying at Dieu's place is a good experience. Dieu is very responsive and helpful in providing a lot of information, he always greets every guest in the restaurant, he says we are the first muslim guest in his homestay, and we are very glad to hear that. The bathroom in the room is very clean and still looks new, hot water is always there, and the blanket is very cozy for cold air. With that price, it is very proportional to the existing facilities. The most important thing is that the location is very close to sun plaza station and moana. The breakfast at the restaurant is also very cheap and delicious. Nice Dieu and crew

This is my favorite hostel in Vietnam. The family is so kind and they go above and beyond to make guests happy. The view from the hostel deck is one-in-a-million. They also booked my hiking and fansipan tours straight away, which made it easy for me. Not to mention I made some new friends staying there which was an added bonus. So do yourself a favor and stay here when visiting Sapa.
They are good people and they will help you in every thing you need even in booking trips and others

Dieu Tran est Ã  lâ€™Ã©coute pour conseiller les voyageurs et les aider dans leur voyage
Le logement correspond Ã  lâ€™annonce, il est propre et proche du centre ville
Bonne expÃ©rience !

The place was lovely. Dieu was a very nice host. However, it was very cold at night and there was no heating. There was a fireplace which was never lit on which was a shame. Had to sleep with our coats on one of the nights. There were stairs to get to the accommodation but these were absolutely fine and easily accessible.
The location is a 2 minute walk from the centre of Sa Pa which was lovely and the place was generally very clean. The showers were good - Okay pressure but hot water was always guaranteed!
Definitely would stay again if we go back in the summer but would not recommend for the winter months.

Câ€™Ã©tait un super sÃ©jour, lâ€™Ã©quipe est trÃ¨s gentille, le gÃ©rant est extrÃªmement sympathique et aide les voyageurs Ã  organiser leur sÃ©jour Ã  Sa Pa, les dortoirs sont trÃ¨s bien, le chat est trÃ¨s mignon

the host was kind and friendly! he was very helpful with our luggages and transportation and even gave recommendations on where to go. the place was clean and spacious enough for the 6 of us. thank you!!

Dieu and all the staff were friendly! Some are fluent in english so we have smooth communication. We love that the place is walkable to all the restos and cafes.
Our dormitory type room was clean. We also love that they have water heater. Our favorite also they have comforters which was great for the cold weather in Sapa.
The food was great! We choose our breakfast in their resto during our whole stay. Worth the price!
Thank you so much!
great host , communicative and friendly! Definitely recommend
friendly host! he speaks english relatively well too, made it a lot easier for communication. wonderful stay thank you!
Incredible host and place! Dieu was so helpful and helped organize trekking and Fansipan cable tours for us which were both incredible!! Very hospitable

great place to stay when in Sapa! extremely nice owner, had a relaxing and quiet night sleep, booked a 2 day sapa trekking tour through the hostel (absolutely must do! pickup/dropoff included, cannot speak higher of this experience) â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸â­ï¸

A wonderful homestay! The place is spotless, cozy, and well-maintained, providing a truly comfortable stay. The host is exceptionally kind and welcoming, always ready to help with a smile. Highly recommended for a relaxing and enjoyable experience!

Dieu/Diego is a very active host, helped us with a lot of local recommendations for food. The rooms were clean and the communal space together with the roof terras were very nice!

My stay at Mega View Homestay in Sapa was an unforgettable experience. The host went above and beyond to make my 3-day adventure as a backpacker truly special. His warm hospitality made me feel right at home from the moment I arrived. The cozy and well-kept rooms offered stunning views of the mountains, making each morning a breathtaking start to the day. The hostâ€™s guidance was invaluableâ€”he helped plan my treks,ensuring I experienced the best of Sapa. The package offered was excellent, providing great value with personalized attention. I highly recommend this homestay for an authentic Sapa experience! thankyou brother. see you again.

Unfortunately I only stayed for one night because I spontaneously extended my trip, but the place is really great! It has a perfect location: quiet, yet close to the city. The room was as described but what really stood out to me was the energy of the owners. They radiate an aura of sympathy. The bar in front offers creative drinks as well as local craft beer and wine. It's a good place to meet people to talk to. When I come back to Sa Pa this is the place to stay!

Get ready for a hike up, wasnâ€™t expecting to have a mini hike up to the airbnb but overall the place was a decent stay!
Its a small cosy room with a mini bathroom.
But was thankful the hosts were very responsive

I loved everything about my stay, my room felt like home and the location is peaceful away from the busy town centre (but not far in walking distance). I highly recommend anyone reading this to book this place as you will not be disappointed. Thank you for having me!

the hosts were very kind, accommodating and responsive. the place is super lovely and we enjoyed coming back to it at the end of a day's trip. will definitely come stay here again when i go back to sapa!

Cozy little place up on a hill. We didn't notice that they don't have ac, however, there was a big fan in the room which helped.

We had a great stay with them! The host was very friendly and considerate. Gave us clear instructions on how to find the place. We arrived at Sapa around 5:30am. They organized the room so we can check in early at 7am even though the check in time is 2pm. A very nice welcome hospitality in Sapa, Vietnam. We'll be sure to comeback. â¤ï¸

Room was exactly as described in post. Beautiful neighbourhood and walkable to everyone. Host was very responsive and proactive with tips, recommendations and connections with fairly priced services. Definitely would return!

We enjoyed our stay at Whisper Home. Super friendly and accommodating hosts. We really enjoyed sitting by the fire and having a drink at the bar. The portable heater and heating pad for the bed were much appreciated during the chilly evenings! The Mist cafe next door is amazing!

This was the highlight of our trip in Vietnam so far. Yen, Chi and Anh were wonderful hosts and made us feel right at home.
A lovely cozy and peaceful atmosphere, a short walk from town. Our bed was comfortable, room was clean, and had everything we needed.
We spent every night by the bar and the fire with our hosts and fellow guests. Donâ€™t forget to say hi to Chot - the cute â€œguard dogâ€.

My partner and I especially want to commend YÃªn for his genuine hospitality and recommendations. The place is walking distance from the city center where there are many options for food, shopping and massages. Easy also to take a taxi to other attractions within Sa Pa (e.g., Cat Cat Village) The accommodations were very clean and comfortable (shoutout to the electric bed warmer too).

This was by far (!) the best Airbnb we stayed in during our Vietnam trip! The room was really cozy and the location was really nice: quiet and hidden but super close to the center. What really added to our comfort were the hosts (including Chot the guard dog) and the hidden bar that was on the property. Weâ€™d always love to come back!

We absolutely adored our stay at Whisper Home. This is such a hidden gem in Sa Pa, I couldnâ€™t recommend it more highly. Itâ€™s very thoughtfully put together, is in a wonderful location, super friendly staff, comes with an adorable pup named ChÃ´t, and a lovely quiet little bar for a night cap. Thank you and we will definitely stay with you again when we return to Sa Pa in the future.

The place is right by the city centre but away from the hustle bustle of the city. The place is very peaceful and cozy. You can literally hear the whispers. And the hosts are super friendly and we really enjoyed chatting with them. I'll definitely recommend their place.
And yes. Special Mention: Their dog Chot (I don't know whether I've spell correctly) is super friendly and super cute. he's such a fluffball.

The place is amazing. The Host is very nice. He provided clear instructions and very friendly. The Host prepared coffee and sweet delicacies in the common area for guests every morning. The bar have nice wine, so please order. The puppy "Chut" is very welcoming and friendly, bring treats for him if you can. We will return to this listing for sure!ğŸ¥°

absolutely loved my stay! yes abd the team was very attentive, kind and accommodating. they gave me lots of useful recommendations and were kind enough to store my luggage - add one more day to my stay due to trekking schedule. thank you very much and will definitely recommend your place further! best regards

Lovely staff and a very very lovely big fluffy dog. They had friendly cats too! Gorgeous place and view. Free breakfast included. A bit of an inconvenient location as the drive up to the place is rocky, bumpy, muddy, and scarily foggy at night. Bugs around the house and in bed and nothing really to prevent the bugs and the place wasnâ€™t fully enclosed. Very lovely for the price though.

I did my first solo travelling to Vietnam and choose this place as my first stay . As a female traveller I feel safe and welcoming. The journey takes you across the village path. It was different and great experience . Totally unforgettable views. The place is literally as its name little house by the rocky mountains. Great sight from the window panel and beautiful nature. Don't be suprised by all the nature surrounding you creating sounds and appearing by its their home anyway we are the guest. The smart tv is a suprised for me cause I didn't see it in the listing which is a great entertainment add up too. The weighted blanket is super amazing to sleep into after a long journey. Totally recommended !

The place was far from the center but the room was cozy and people were so accommodating. The restaurant food was also good and the problem was just the location. Itâ€™s too far but all in all itâ€™s a 10/10.

Cute rustic hut with a stunning view (Quite foggy when we went). The hut is located in a resort with a few different huts and the area is beautifully managed and feels private. The couple downsides were the location was that it is remote and away from the main attractions, Sa Pa and restaurants. Harder to get taxi/grabs because the road is pretty bumpy/bad to navigate as you'll find out. Secondly, the bathroom has gaps which allows a lot of insects in and the hut is small and doesn't feel as luxurious as other huts on the resort. Hosts were very helpful and have a small menu for breakfast and dinner with veggie options. Thank you for letting us stay
The host was very nice and friendly.  Will definitely recommend the place if looking for beautiful scenery. The location is a bit far from city so would recommend check-in during day time.
Really beautiful location with an amazing view! I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who wants to get away from the city life. Was a very nice and calm getaway high up in the mountains!

We loved our stay! The staff were super friendly and accommodating. However, accessibility was a bit of a challenge - the road is still under development and quite bumpy. It's also a bit far from the city center, so it's not ideal for those with a packed itinerary. But for a relaxing getaway, especially for honeymooners, this place is perfect! The view is stunning, and the adorable host dog stole our hearts (tip: bring dog treats for instant friendliness).

I had a wonderful stay at Rock Garden homestay in Sapa, Vietnam. The cabin was cozy, and spotlessâ€”truly great value for money. Everything was smooth and comfortable, and I couldn't have asked for more.

Die Unterkunft ist einfach perfekt, wenn man ein wenig Ruhe in Vietnam sucht.

No words to describe my satisfaction booking this place. the host was super kind and the staffs there are super helpful and nice. sooo glad we booked this place for our honeymoon. they have this beautiful place to eat, we spent hours there, feels super cozy and the food was great! just the journey to the town is abit rough, but there is plenty of places to visit nearby. thank you and hope to stay here again â¤ï¸

Prachtig verblijf!
Het zicht was prachtig. We hadden af en toe mist, maar deze trok snel weg. Het huisje is klein, maar je hebt alles wat je nodig hebt. Je moet er wel rekening mee houden dat er insecten of kleine beestjes aanwezig kunnen zijn. Het huisje is rustig gelegen op 20 min van Sa Pa. Een taxirit kost 200 000 VND. De weg ernaartoe is hobbelig maar doenbaar. De hosts waren super vriendelijk! Het avondeten in het restaurant was heerlijk. Ze hebben speciaal voor ons vroeg in de ochtend ontbijt voorzien, omdat we extra vroeg moesten vertrekken voor een wandeltocht. Ze waren super flexibel en hebben ons een geweldige tijd bezorgd!
Hoang Hai is a great host whos able to answer all your enquiries and its a good place of a get away at the peaceful side of the country

Serene and peaceful location. Host very responsive and provided recommendations for activities and transports.
On the downside, I think the unit was too small for the price. No side table, not enough place to lay our bags and walk about, no mirror except in the toilet. The electrical wiring could have been done better, especially inside the bathroom. I was afraid we could get electrocuted.

Amazing place. The view is unforgettable. Service amazing. The food is the best we had in Vietnam. They also offer private tours - we took around Sapa rice fields and  hiking to Fransipan - both guides were amazing. This place really exceeds all expectations. Definitely recommend to anyone who want to be outside the touristic hustle and enjoy breathtaking view and very good food.

The property itself is breathtaking. All of the staff are very nice. Although the property is quite a way out of town and the roads and currently extremely damaged from the recent typhoon so itâ€™s difficult to get in and out. They do have food there but there wasnâ€™t a huge selection so be prepared to bring snacks or some of your own food. The animals at the property are beautiful and very friendly

Our stay at was absolutely wonderful! The cozy atmosphere and stunning mountain views made it the perfect getaway. The host, was incredibly friendly and helpful. The room was clean and comfortable. We'll definitely be returning for another visit!

The place looks exactly like the pictures and is even more beautiful. The property has a main lodge where they served us great breakfast. We also ate the home made dinner and it was delicious. The host is very helpful, especially with booking taxi drivers. The place is a bit far from the town of Sapa because the road to get there is very bumpy and full of pot holes but I thought it was so worth it cause it was so peaceful. The shower gets hot and the bed sheets were very comfortable. The Air Conditioning worked very well also.

The best stay in Vietnam!The room was very cozy and comfy .weather is perfect for resting.warm lights made it more cozy and homey. A beautiful homestay. Thanh and Chang went out of their way to make me feel at home. The surroundings are absolutely gorgeous. Instantly you feel welcome in the house.
