An absolute must: sit down to a family dinner with Thanh and Chang, and book your Sapa Trek through their recommended guide. One of my favourite experiences abroad ever.

Honestly it was one of my all time Favorite stays ever and I have traveled many places and iâ€™m always trying to find hidden gems and I think this is the purest of them all, the hosts made the experience exceptional and the make sure you join in for dinner as it is one of a lifetime experience, and youâ€™ll sleep like a baby trust me, very comfy beds and the shower pressure is a no match.

Thanh and his wife are very kind and friendly. Their home is simple, surrounded by stunning landscapes. We shared a dinner altogether with the other guests, it was so nice, feeling that we were at home :)

Es war meine bisher beste AirBnb Erfahrung. Die Gastgeber waren unheimlich nett und hilfsbereit. Ich hab mich ab Sekunde 1 wie zuhause gefÃ¼hlt. Es ist der perfekte Ort um einfach mal nichts zu tun und runterzukommen. Ich kann nur empfehlen am Familien Abendessen teilzunehmen. Noch mal vielen Dank fÃ¼r die wundervolle Zeit.

Amazing stay, with amazingly warm hosts!! I don't think my experience at Sapa would be as amazing as it is without Thanh and her husband. Special shout out to Ca, Indi and Ngou who made this stay so much more lively and cute :)

One of my favorite stays in Vietnam!
The location is perfect â€“ even better than being in the center of Sa Pa. The house was super comfortable, and every evening we enjoyed a cozy fire in the fireplace. The animals around the place were adorable, and the food was amazing â€“ especially dinner, probably the best Vietnamese food I've ever had! What made it even more special were the little touches, like a warm tea after dinner. They really pay attention to the small things. Highly recommended!

I had a wonderful stay at Thanhâ€™s homestay! The place was very nice and my bed was super comfy. Thanh and his wife were very accommodating and helpful throughout my stay. The family dinner was delicious and Thanhâ€™s coffees each morning were so good! Would definitely recommend staying here!

They were very kind and always looked out for me. They told me lots of stories when we had family dinners. I also had many opportunities to interact with the other guests. Thanks to them, I had a very enjoyable trip.
Lovely, cosy place to stay made even better by the friendly and kind hosts and the cool people you will get to meet. You must do a family meal, the food is some of the best I have had in Vietnam!

Indi house has my heart. Hosts are incredible, super friendly and helpful. The vibe is peaceful and the surroundings are beautiful. The pets are also so sweet and well behaved. I will definitely be going back :)

Felt right at home once I arrived. I had such a fun experience at Thanh's house. It was warm, cozy, peaceful, and perfect! She recommended the local village hike tour which I enjoyed so much along with the friends I met. A lot of restaurants, cafes, and spa are nearby, as well.

Had an extremely relaxing and enjoyable stay at Indi House. Space was as described, facilities were well maintained, and family dinner/s were extremely tasty and affordable. Location was great, next to a stream, which was a peaceful sound to fall asleep and rest to. Lots of great restaurants were within walking distance, and lots of opportunities for trekking in Ta Van/Sapa.
Honestly one of the few times on Airbnb that I would honestly believe the reviews

I had a truly wonderful stay at this place. There were two dogs and a cat, all very calm and adorable. The people here were also incredibly kind and warm-hearted. The two hosts were especially generousâ€”they even prepared breakfast for me, which was absolutely delicious.
The room was very clean and quiet, making for a peaceful and comfortable stay. The living room had stylish decor and was a great spot to relax and refresh. The hosts also introduced me to a local trekking guide, who was fantastic and helped make the experience even more memorable.
The trek was quite long and physically demandingâ€”it took over half a dayâ€”so Iâ€™d recommend being prepared in terms of stamina. That said, the hosts kindly lent me rubber boots, so I didnâ€™t have to worry about getting my shoes or feet dirty. Along the way, I was able to meet and interact with people from various ethnic communities, which was a deeply meaningful and rare experience.
After returning from the trek, I was offered a shower, which
A great place to stay if you want to have a chill and relaxing trip. Great host which very helpful in everything!

The place is very cute and cozy! I didnâ€™t have the best weather but I still managed to walk and hike around a little and the village is very nice! The dinners are delicious and fun as you get to chat with the hosts and the other guests. They have heated mattresses which is AMAZING!

Thank you for a wonderful stay! Highly recommended - kind and helpful hosts; it was clean and cozy and very hospitable and delicious. Donâ€™t miss a chance to get banh mi for  breakfast. Best of luck!

I had the only sleeping place not in a room. It was a good place to stay, certainly safe enough. This really feels like a homestay, you can have dinner with the lovely couple running the place and the other guests staying there. Very recommendable.

Our family loved staying in the villa. We hired scooters which made getting into town easy. The Grab app is also great for cheap taxis. The hotel next door has a good restaurant so dinner was easy when we didn't feel like going far. Such a nice experience staying in an alpine style villa overlooking the valley with Fansipan in the distance

One of the most memorable nature stays we've ever had. Van Anh, our host, was incredibly warm and helpful throughout our visit. The mountain views were absolutely breathtaking â€” truly the highlight of our trip.

We werden hartelijk ontvangen, in het begin was er wat mis gegaan met de reservering maar ze dachten gelijk mee in oplossingen. En er was gelijk goede duidelijke communicatie via wathsapp.
De ruimte waar we verbleven was erg netjes en schoon. Fijne plek om te verblijven!
Ook het personeel is erg vriendelijk en meedenkend. Het is mogelijk een scooter bij hun te huren, ook denken ze mee met vervoer naar andere plekken zoals terug naar Hanoi.
Bij hun restaurant zijn er veel verschillende dingen te kiezen om te eten en drinken.
We voelden ons erg welkom en zouden hier zeker terug komen! We raden iedereen dit verblijf aan!

Had a lovely stay at Indi house! One of our favourite airbnbs in Vietnam. The village, Ta Van, was the perfect place to stay to experience the picturesque mountains of Sapa and is home to the best restaurants, cafes and bars with incredible views within a 5 minute walk from the Airbnb. The hosts were so so kind and helped us book taxis and a hike and prepared delicious family meals for all the guests. We definitely recommend staying here if you come to Sapa, felt like a home away from home!

Had a lovely stay at Thanhâ€™s place. We were arriving late from the ha giang loop but Thanh organised a taxi for us to pick us up which we really appreciated. The home was so warm and cosy with lovely friendly dogs. The family dinner was delicious and was so nice to meet people and listen to their stories. Would highly recommend! Thank you :)

I love the trip in sapa, Thanh made a lot of precious memories for us. I highly recommend you to join the hiking tour. A Red Dzao maam will be your guide, she will share the lifestyle , culture of her ethnicity or other interesting stories to you. Itâ€™s a very unique and unforgettable experience. Thanhâ€™s house is very beautiful and I love the style. Weâ€™ve dinner together and it was excellent, iâ€™m sad that I could not taste it anymore. Anyway, we had a very good time in Thanhâ€™s homestay. Iâ€™m sure I will miss it a lot. (Btw: Thanhâ€™s wife is very pretty )

this was one of the most intimate and beautiful home stays iâ€™ve had the pleasure to experience. Thanh truly makes you feel like a part of her home. Donâ€™t miss out on the family dinner, the food she cooked was so, so delicious!
I really enjoyed my stay here. What a lovely experience.
thank you Thanh!

My friends and I were happy to have experienced Than and Chang's hospitality. The house, although not looking as new as when the photos were taken, proved to be very cozy and well maintained in terms of cleanliness. We loved the dinner that the family prepared, and their adorable cat and two dogs. The nature was lovely and there were some quaint cafes to eat so we only needed to go to town once. Would definitely recommend the place for a stay and for the experience.

Had the most wonderful stay in Chang and Thanhâ€™s lovely home. Such kind people that go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and happy. Thanh is such an amazing cook! Amazing trekking tour offered also which is highly recommended. In a beautiful village where you really get a feel for the local way of life. Walking distance to restaurants, cafes and bars.

Home, far away from home! I could stay here forever. The room and bed is so cozy, the house as well; food (dinner) is outstanding and the help and recommendations are amazing. Did the trekking with a local guide and really loved it. Even while the weather wasnâ€™t great, still extended my stay because of Indi House ğŸ˜

One of my favorite stays in Vietnam!
The location is perfect â€“ even better than being in the center of Sa Pa. The house was super comfortable, and every evening we enjoyed a cozy fire in the fireplace. The animals around the place were adorable, and the food was amazing â€“ especially dinner, probably the best Vietnamese food I've ever had! What made it even more special were the little touches, like a warm tea after dinner. They really pay attention to the small things. Highly recommended!

By far my favourite place I have stayed in Viet Nam. The house was so homely, and Thanh & Trang were so welcoming, helpful and spoke perfect English, we loved getting to know them! I would have loved to have stayed longer. The vibe of the town was peaceful and stunning. Loved every minute. Thank you Thanh & Trang!!

Ta Van is a beautiful village with plenty of restaurants and bars. Amazing landscape. Due to really bad weather we couldnâ€™t enjoy it in a proper way. We can recommend the tour with a local guide offered by the hosts. We also liked the breakfast and the family dinner. Good opportunity to get in touch with other guests. If you arrive in Sa Pa we would recommend to let Thanh to order the taxi for a good price. The communication with him worked easily and fast.

We enjoyed this stay SO much. I brought my 8 year old and they made him feel so comfortable and itâ€™s just a lovely home and couple. The area for any of these home stays is not as remote as described, they are piled on top of each other. But it is still somehow very peaceful. We enjoyed it here more than anywhere else and loved the wonderfully cooked home meals that were shared.
We had an amazing stay! The hosts are friendly and made us feel right at home. The food at the family dinners and breakfast was amazing. It's a beautiful base to explore Sapa! ğŸ˜€

Thanh og hans kone var helt ekstremt imÃ¸tekommende! Vi skulle vÃ¦re der i en natt, og det fÃ¸ltes ut som jeg var pÃ¥ et familiebesÃ¸k. SÃ¥ positive og gjestfrie verter finner du sjeldent. Tusen takk for at vi fikk bo hos dere!
If youâ€™re looking for an authentic Vietnamese homestay, this is it! Thanh and Chan are very hospitable and their home is beautiful. The local village has lots going on. A hidden gem â¤ï¸

We loved staying here, just beautiful. Our hosts went above and beyond for us from helping with transport to booking a local guide to chatting over dinner and drinks together. Special place run by special people!

We had an amazing time staying at Indi homestay, Thanh and Chang were the perfect hosts. They helped us organise taxis to and from Sapa, a great local guide for a trek and the local laundry service. Changâ€™s food was incredible and the best food we have had in Vietnam. The homestay was impeccably cleaned multiple times a day, meaning that sharing a bathroom with others was no problem at all. The location is excellent, the village has loads of great restaurants and cafes - MUCH better than Sapa town. We felt right at home and would love to stay again if we come back to Sapa in the future.
Best Homestay experience in Vietnam. Amazing hosting, fantastic food and location is a dream. Great and lovely Communication with the hosts who help out with Everything! Cant wait to get back!

Thanh and Chang were extremely welcoming, our stay here felt just like home! We really enjoyed the interaction with other guests over a scrumptious home-cooked family dinner on our last night! There are two dogs and a cat here as well ğŸˆğŸ•ğŸ•
We had a lovely stay at the Indi House. Easy and flexible check-in at night possible and really delicious food. We felt directly at home, especially the family dinner was amazing.

We had a wonderful stay at Thanhâ€™s homestay. The location is perfect, in a beautiful village, away from the bustle of Sapa town. There are lots of great coffee shops around, and opportunities for scenic walks/hikes. The house is very well arranged, and has everything we needed. The communal dinners were a great opportunity to exchange with Thanh, his wife and the other guests.

Our experience was fantastic. Thanh and his wife were incredibly helpful, taking care of all our arrangements, from booking taxis to organizing guided hiking tours. We also had the pleasure of enjoying a delicious breakfast and dinner with them for a reasonable additional cost. Plus, they serve excellent espresso, which is definitely worth the extra charge.

Amazing homestay!  Very cosy and felt right at home. Our hosts were lovely and made us a wonderful family dinner which was very tasty! The house had lots of character and a great view of the mountains and paddy fields. It is a perfect place to relax and unwind. There are also 2 really friendly dogs and a nice cat! Would recommend to a friend 100%

Staying at Mays place was a highlight of our trip. Her family are beautiful, welcoming us with warm smiles and great hospitality. Nice location away from the craziness of Sapa which is exactly what we wanted. The Airbnb was clean and comfortable with lovely nature surrounding it. I would save yourself some worry booking anything else and come stay here!!

If you come to Sapa, you have to stay here! The place is incredible, surrounded by nature! May and her family are very welcome and friendly. I suggest you to do the hiking with them as you will see incredible views. Additionally the food they make is absolutely delicious.

Our stay was absolutely fabulous! The host went above and beyond to ensure our comfort and enjoyment. The place was immaculate, beautiful, and equipped with everything we needed. The location was perfect, and the views were breathtaking. We felt truly at home and cannot wait to come back. the food is probably the best we have tried in Vietnam and may and her family are adorable.
I will come back for sure
Highly recommend!
---

Without a doubt, staying here was the highlight and best part of our trip. May, Cao, and Hua were amazingly gracious hosts! We looked forward to every single home-cooked meal, and the activities were so fun and special. Once in a lifetime experience - breathtaking views and hosts that made us feel right at home. We are already planning our next trip back!

we enjoyed our stay at May's place. her hospitality is superb and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. she prepared nice meals for us.
the only downside is that it is in a village which means that it would be more challenging to walk around on our own. if we stayed there long enough, we should be able to navigte around the village, but it requires travelling up and down hill to get to nearest amenities by foot.
otherwise, May and her family took great care of us and gave us good advice and recommendation and made our stay very memorable. we will definitely recommend her place and do it again if we have the chance.

We had a great experience enjoying the quiet of the village! The communication was extremely smooth from the very beginning, the room was lovely and clean, the food was simply amazing. We really enjoyed the hike through the rice fields with MÃ¢y.
Superb experience staying with May and family. She has all you need for a quality escape from cityâ€™s hustle bustle. Just book your stay with May, pack your bag and indulge in the peace of mind!

A Perfect Mountain Retreat for Families
Our family of four had a wonderful stay here. Máº©y is an exceptionally gracious hostâ€”every meal was delicious and made with fresh, local ingredients. Her son, CÃ¡o, was incredibly helpful with communication before and during our visit, making everything smooth and easy.
Though itâ€™s off the beaten track, thatâ€™s exactly what made it the perfect retreat. The peaceful setting, far from tourist crowds, gave our kids a chance to explore nature, spot wildlife, and meet friendly farm animals. It was restful, beautiful, and full of charm. Skeptical of leaving behind their screens when we came, after three nights here, our kids didnâ€™t want to leave when it was time!
What made the experience even more special was learning about the Dao minority, to which Máº©y and her family belong. Their warmth and connection to the land gave us a deeper appreciation for the culture of this region.

May and her family are extremely welcoming hosts! They are very friendly and often took the initiative to find out about our plans, so that they can accommodate to us.
The location is very peaceful and a great getaway into the village! May recommended many activities for us to do, such as trekking, motorbike tour, climbing fansipan mountain (all guided by her or Cao), so you wonâ€™t have to stress too much about finding local guides!
The Airbnb is located at least 30min away from sapa town by car, and thereâ€™s only two taxi drivers who are skilled enough to drive through the bumpy terrain of the villages to get to the Airbnb! May and Cao are very quick to contact them whenever we needed the transport.
The food prepared by May and her family is extremely delicious too! Lots of fresh vegetables and fruits :)
I did not have trouble communicating with May and Cao as they can speak English well!
Overall I highly recommend this airbnb, I hope to come back one day!
Simply Beautifulâ€¦ A treat to all five senses in paradise. Most of all, the warm and uncompromising hospitality will forever etched in our memoriesâ€¦

I cannot say enough good things about May, her family, and this place. It really is a little oasis in the rice fields! We loved everything about our stay - from our bungalow (which was very clean and comfortable), to the food (so delicious), and most of all, to May, Cao, and the entire family for welcoming us with such open arms. We were really looking forward to this leg of our trip to Vietnam and it was beyond our expectations. Simply perfect. Staying here is our highlight and a must if youâ€™re in the region!
We highly recommend doing the trek, and enjoying the home cooked meals (with other visitors if youâ€™re lucky) - such nice moments!

Staying with May and her lovely family was unique, special, and a true privilege. May was not only generous with the food servings (such yummy food!!) but also with her time and patience. She answered my million questions with so much patience and always with a smile. My kids and I enjoyed being her guests immensely and felt immediately very welcome. The surrounding area is so gorgeous and the bungalow itself was very nice and comfortable. We went on a hike in the mountains and bamboo forest, the views were breathtaking and we even stopped at a waterfall and were able to jump in for a swim. The hike was not so easy especially after the rain, but May was attentive and made sure we were okay. At night we had the herbal bath and that too was a lovely experience. We will cherish our time with May, her family and the dogs. Thank you, lovely family!

Zalige verblijfplaats als je houdt van rust en natuur. Weg van de drukte in Sa Pa, maar toch niet ver weg als je even wat meer actie wil. Scootertocht van Ã©Ã©n dag gedaan. Een echte aanrader (bij mooi weer). Prachtige vergezichten en s middags eten bij locals (lekker). Ook het medicinaal kruidenbad was een ervaring. May was een zeer goede gastvrouw. Ze doet je onmiddellijk thuis voelen. Het eten (zowel ontbijt, lunch als diner) is zeer lekker (bedankt aan Mayâ€™s schoondochter). Wij hebben ontzettend genoten van ons verblijf.

expÃ©rience hors norme en dehors des hordes touristiques.
accueil exceptionnel de la part de may et de sa famille.
nourriture, convivialitÃ© et disponibilitÃ© sont les maÃ®tres mots de l'hÃ©bergement.
sans oublier la quiÃ©tude.
A dÃ©couvrir trÃ¨s vite !!
merci du fond du cÅ“ur â¤ï¸

May and her family were super kind and accommodative. They took great care of us and even allowed us to cook a vegetarian meal in their kitchen. May helped us gather the ingredients from the market, communicate with the locals and took us around to get an idea of their village. We had an awesome time at her place

We had a wonderful stay at May Homestay!
May and her husband are incredibly kind and welcomingâ€”we truly felt at home.
The food they prepared for us was absolutely delicious!
We would have loved to stay longer if we could, and we hope to come back one day.
Definitely the best homestay!
Anton, Claire & Milo

We had an absolutely amazing stay! The place was truly magical, and May and her family were incredibly welcoming and helpful throughout our visit. They helped us organize a reliablie taxi, they helped with our bags in the middle of the night, they were great companions during the meals and awesome guides through adevntures.
It was undoubtedly the highlight of our trip.
We took advantage of most of the available amenities, and every experience was well worth itâ€”especially the motorbike trip through the villages, which was breathtaking at every stop.
And the foodâ€¦ wow! Every day, we looked forward to dinner and supper, as each meal was not only delicious but also a chance to try dishes we had never experienced before.
Thank you for making our stay so special. We would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for unforgettable experience.

Amazing homestay! Can not recommend it more! Unfortunately we had an illness in our group and had to leave early, which May and her family fully understood and where so helpful getting us back to the city! Great family, great food!

The happy bungalow was exactly described!! May and Cao were the best hosts and made amazing food, took us on great adventures and were overall so hospitable and welcoming. Very easy to connect with the family as well as other travelers who were there. Thank you so so much for an amazing stay!!!

May and her family are great hosts, probably the best I've had on airbnb. We felt right at home.
The cabin was very clean and well maintained. They also arranged transport to and from the village for us.
I'd visit again in a heartbeat!

May and Cao were very hospitable from the beginning. We stayed in a lovely little cabin they built in their garden. At night, they provided us with mosquito nets, which was greatly appreciated given that we were in the mountains.
They prepared delicious and varied dinner and breakfast for us and offered a trekking tour for the next day. May was our guide and explained everything about their culture and the rice fields they work in.
We loved the place and the experience, and we would definitely return if we came back.

It was a beautiful experience in sapa. Situated away from the hustle bustle of streets. U see the beauriful mountains very peaceful. We had a villa with both g space and three room with all the amenities. Kids ahd good space to relax n have fun. It was amazing experience.. I would recommend everyone if u want to be in the lap of nature n have real feel of Sapa you should definitely go for this property. Heartful Thanks to our host Jenny. She was so helpful, alway available she even arranged for the baby diapers. Thank you Jenny.. We are taking back beautiful memories of Sapa.

I had a great stay at this Airbnb! A big highlight was the host- they were incredibly responsive, helpful, and made the whole experience smooth and stress-free. I really appreciated the warm welcome and the wonderful gift, which was such a lovely surprise. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a pleasant and hassle-free stay!

We had a wonderful time at this beautiful, spacious stay nested in a peaceful neighbourhood with a breathtaking view. Special thanks to Jenny for all her help and great recommendations. We'd love to visit again for a longer duration.

Jenny was very proactive in connecting us to other vendors like motorbike and trekking. We really appreciate all the food recommendations and help in booking of train tickets. Apart from the insects that invaded our abode, everything else was sensational.

Heel fijn verblijf dichtbij het centrum van Sa Pa maar toch heel rustig met mooi uitzicht! Ruime woonkamer en leuk terras. De hosts waren heel vriendelijk en regelde alles voor ons in korte tijd. Scooters, trektochten en vervoer midden in de nacht naar huisje. Ook was ze altijd bereikbaar voor aanbevelingen en liet ze ons onze spullen wat langer in het huisje laten! Zeker aan te raden

The stay with Jenny was so great. She even booked our sleeper bus going to and from hanoi-sapa. The place was on hilltop, perfect for group vacations and for a peaceful goodnight sleep far from the busy center. Although far from the busy center, the sapa station is walkable under 1 km.
They also helped us with our bags/luggage.
They gave us a tour cheaper than klook.
Thank you, Jenny and Thung.

The place was perfect for our party. Jen was so friendly and always communicated with us. She booked a Sapa hike, motorbikes, a BBQ, and even a driver to pick us up at the bus station. Apart from the house being up in the hills, Jen brings the most value to this Airbnb. I recommend it 100%; our party of 4 loved it.

Beautiful home in Sapa with a really nice view. The place is very spacious, clean and cozy. Really felt like home away from home :) It is also near from the tourist spots in Sapa.
Communication was seamless! Jenny and Thanh are very responsive, kind and accommodating ensuring our stay comfortable from start to finish. They even gave my mom a bouquet of flowers as present for her birthday â¤ï¸ they also helped us booked our sleeper bus ticket and also helped us with our tour. We never had any issues in our stay here.
Thank you, Jenny and Thanh for having us. Your warm welcome and generous hospitality made our stay truly memorable. Weâ€™re grateful for the wonderful time spent in your lovely home. ğŸ˜Š

The place is peaceful. Outside it was a picturesque. You can see the mountain and the fields.
For a large group like us, the place was perfect, we avoided the hustle and bustle of Sapa square.
Our host (Jenny) was exceptional. She consistently provides high level of kindness and helpfulness. She arranged our sleeper bus from Hanoi to Sapa, find a limousine for us and consistently provide us with assistance. Sheâ€™s sweet and very friendly.
The place is highly recommended to guest who wants a peaceful and comfort of a home.
Beautiful view from the house. Itâ€™s a great location that is walking distance from Sapaâ€™s center. Host is responsive and very helpful.

Thanh & Jenny were amazing hosts.
The place was serine. Few minutes from the center.
Jenny went over and beyond and accommodated us with any warm hospitality.
Thanh and Jenny very responsive hosts. Everything just right. We would definitely book again if we go to Sapa. Thanks for hosting us!

Very humble and helping host, I must say!
House design and location are just too good; view is so mesmerising that we didnâ€™t bother to go our much.

Amazing, will come back a hundred times!!!
Great service, even picked us up from bus station for free! really touching <~<
Recommended 100%
Would definitely recommend. Amazing location with insane view and great place! Host was very communicative and very helpful as well!
Great location and host!

My friends and I had such an amazing time at La Maison SAPA, with its great scenery and restaurant colocated with the bungalow. It also had many cute kittens that we could play with. Most importantly the staff were super friendly and proactive, assisting us with check ins and even giving recommendations on places to go!
We wished we couldâ€™ve stayed for longer :)

A heartfelt thank you to the entire team for taking such great care of us! We had easy access to activities that truly reflect the local culture and surroundings. The restaurant next door is a real highlight â€” serving delicious coffee, fresh juices, and even featuring some adorable little animals that made our experience even more special.

Hosts were very accomodating and helpful. Our enquiries were always answered promptly which made our travel plans smooth. Arrangements for transport was also hassle-free. Definitely recommend staying here if you are looking for a peaceful place away from the busy city/town. Huge thanks to Sen for always ensuring everything was accounted for!

The place is in Ta Van, just outside Sa Pa: is actually really nice!
Way more relaxed, beautiful surroundings and not as busy Sa Pa. Lots of great coffee places and cafes around. So location a 10!
The host is actually amazing, helped us a lot with e.g. renting a scooter & taxi and was soooo quick in responsive. Really nice! ğŸ˜Š
They had kittens at the garden (too cute!) & the whole â€˜common areaâ€™ was extremely beautiful. Surrounded by green and everything is made from wood :)
The reason weâ€™re not giving five stars is because we thought price-wise it was quite expensive for the house you get. The mattress was on the ground, and there was construction very early in the morning.

La Maison was exactly as described, no frills but exactly everything you would need. I went in early May and it was summer, but Truc provided many fans to keep us cool and the house was always breezy so the heat was not an issue at all.
Truc, Sen and Nicole were extremely helpful and accommodating the entire trip, sorted out transport and treks for me. Very responsive as well. Thank you so much for making sure that my stay in Sapa was as wonderful as it can be.
PS: the resident cat has won my heart.

Environnement trÃ¨s paisible avec une belle vue sur les montagnes et riziÃ¨res. A lâ€™Ã©cart de la ville sans charme de Sapa. Logement agrÃ©able, trÃ¨s beau restaurant oÃ¹ nous prenions le petit-dÃ©jeuner. Je trouve juste dommage quâ€™il nâ€™y avait personne sur place avec qui nous pouvions Ã©changer sur les activitÃ©s aux alentours. Je recommande tout de mÃªme fortement ce logement car le cadre est magnifique et trÃ¨s ressourÃ§ant.
Such a beautiful serene spot! Free breakfast in the mornings was delicious, and we loved getting to know all the animals on the property. Close to lots of great food and beautiful surroundings!

This place was stunning. The location is great, we initially thought it would be closer to Sa Pa City but in the end, we were so happy about the location (itâ€™s a 30 minutes drive from Sa Pa City). The village is lovely with plenty of beautiful restaurants around where you can just chill and relax. The home is on the same property as a cafe/restaurant that has a cozy vibe with kind cats and dogs. The staff and hosts were amazing, helped us out a bunch (laundry, taxi and more).
Were we to come back, we would most likely book this place again.

We had a great stay at the bungalow, and we celebrated our first wedding anniversary here. The village is amazing (sooo much better than Sapa) and it offers everything you need â€” beautiful nature and views, lots of trekking trails, there are also restaurants, bars, shops and even a good spa. The garden in front of the house and the decoration really stood out. Truc and Thi Sen were very responsive and helped us with everything we needed.
Breakfasts were ok (big portions, but not as great in taste as we were used to in Vietnam). On the downside, I think the cabin could use more storage space â€” the overall aesthetic suffers when our things are scattered on the floor. Also, unfortunately, the bungalow area wasnâ€™t very peaceful â€” we were often woken up in the morning by construction noises, drilling, and so on.

This place was absolutely stunning. Very rustic and charming, perfect spot for an artistic soul. Doesn't have all the fancy amenities, but has everything you need. The view of the mountain from my bed every morning was magical. The traditional Dzay set menu was one of the best meals I've ever had. And the homebrew ginger beer changed my life. The hosts are friendly and helpful. The design of the garden and the art gallery show an excellent eye. 1000/10

â€œI had an unforgettable stay at this beautiful and artistic property in Sapa, run by the kindest hosts. Nicole, the host, went above and beyond to make my stay specialâ€”she showed me around, introduced me to her friends, and shared the rich history of the area. The property itself is stunning, with its own art gallery, cafÃ©, and so much more. My only regret is not staying longer. I canâ€™t wait to return and spend more time here!â€

Peaceful place that is slightly away from Sapa town. Simple but delicious breakfast was provided as well. Love the drinks specially the coconut coffee at Sa Moc!

Nicole was very responsive and easily contactable whenever we have question or require a driver.
The 4 cats and 2 dogs hosts were super cute and welcoming, making the place so memorable â¤ï¸
Highly recommend this place!
Best place eveeer, felt like I was living in a dream land! Youâ€™ll need a bike to go into the city centre but the location was beautiful. Just like the pictures

Our stay at La Maison was memorable. Cute bungalow in the town of Ta Van which has a very relaxed atmosphere. The restaurant linked to the homestay was the highlight with delicious food, great hospitality and cozy atmosphere.

We were advised by friends who have recently stayed in Sapa town to stay In one of the outskirt villages and we couldnâ€™t agree more. Ta Van was peaceful and quiet it felt rural but still very close to Sapa which we enjoyed checking out for day trips. The bungalow has amazing mountain views and is at the base of where many of the walks and treks start. Water was hot, bathroom was clean, bed had an electric blanket which was perfect. Highlight of our stay was the warm hospitality of the cafe/restaurant that is next door to the bungalow â€˜Sa Mocâ€™ delicious food and drink, very welcoming! The host and Sen were quick to respond and very helpful with booking activities and taking care of any queries we had. Would recommend to friends 100%

Wow! Where to even start. The stay was fantastic. Had come from Hanoi and needed somewhere quieter and this was the place.
As soon as we arrived we felt so peaceful. The amazing surroundings paired with the beautiful bungalow was something I wonâ€™t forget.
The location is 20 minutes taxi from sapa town but staying a little bit further away was actually so much nicer. The village offers restaurants, drinks and plenty of cute animals.
The food at Trucâ€™s was also good, very generous portions.
Thank you, will be recommending to many other travellers heading to Sapa.

Truc was great, so responsive and helpful. Helped us book a taxi and get a motorbike. The surroundings are beautiful, itâ€™s so cozy and pretty, there are cozy lights in the night. Itâ€™s peaceful generally but there was a lot of construction work going on around the place when we stayed during Christmas so was a bit loud.
Food and coffee is good and definitely try the homemade wines. The only thing was that the rest of the staff felt a bit unwelcoming and unhelpful, only nice when around the owner. Overall would recommend!

The aesthetics of this place is just beyond words. We stayed here for 3 nights and we loved every bit of it. Nicole was so friendly and helping host.. If Iâ€™m in Sa Pa, I wonâ€™t choose any other place than this.

Had an awesome couple days. Even with rainy weather the vibe of this spot did not disappoint. Piano music, good food, kind people, cute stores nearby, an incredibly bakery down the way, kind people, and the best kittens. Highly recommend.

My friend and I spent six nights at La Maison and loved it. The four kittens were a bonus. The restaurant onsite was charming and delicious. Truc found a great trekking guide for us and the scenery was amazing. Lovely place to unplug and relax.

My stay at La Maison was nothing short of spectacular. If you're looking to get away from it all, but still have access to some sightseeing, bars and restaurants, this is the place to go. Truc is an incredible host; proactive in communication and replies within minutes of any questions asked. Truc is also super helpful and was able to arrange a scooter during my stay as well as a driver for an evening out and to take me to the bus station.
I am going bak to Vietnam and this place is on the top of my list!

The family house is in the middle of their tribe's village, in the Ta Van mountainous area.
Their viillage was filled with ducks and chickens, other pets, so much nature and amazing views whichever way you looked. I had a lovely stay with the family.
Most of all I really enjoyed the homemade fresh food they had to cooked everyday. Their cooking made me think of home.
Thank you everyone ğŸ«°ğŸ¾ğŸ¥°

If you come to Sapa don't miss the chance to stay with this family.  May, Sieu, Cao, and Hoa really put a lot of themselves into their little homestay.   The village is off the main road and the homestay is at the end of the village,  a very tranquil place.   You will be surrounded by Red Dao language and culture.  Home cooked meals are fantastic.   Also don't miss the motorbike and walking tours.  I will certainly be back next time I'm in the neighborhood!

Excellent sÃ©jour Ã  lâ€™Ã©cart de la frÃ©nÃ©sie de Sapa. Nous y avons passÃ© trois nuits.

Place might be far from the city but it's worth the travel there for us as we're there for the nature. Love the surroundings as we managed to enjoy both foggy weather and sunny weather. May and family is also very welcoming and friendly. Never fail to answer any questions we have for them.

We had a wonderful time here! Even though we visited during the Tet holiday, May welcomed us right into her family. We loved walking around the village, petting all the dogs, and eating home-cooked dinner together every night. We also really enjoyed trekking in the mountains and doing herbal bath at night. May and her family were extremely accommodating, they even drove us by motorbike to our taxi driver so that we would make it to our bus on time. We will definitely come back here again in the future!

Amazing location, beautiful surroundings and incredible people. Best Airbnb weâ€™ve stayed at in Vietnam and one of the best Airbnbs overall. Sa pa was the highlight of our Vietnam trip and a lot of that was down to May and her family. We thoroughly enjoyed her home cooked meals, conversations with her and her family, walks in the area, motorcycles tour, pets and the accommodation. Highly recommended for an authentic experience.

There aren't the words to describe our experience with May and her lovely family. It truly made our trip to Vietnam unforgettable. Beautiful place and beautiful people.  We did the days walk, the day motorbike trip and had an amazing herbal bath. All of it was fantastic. The food was amazing and getting an opportunity to stay in an authentic village was something I will never forget. Very sad to leave. I couldn't recommend this more.

we had a great time with May and her Family. the Herbal Bath is a must do. she allowed us to cook Indian food in her kitchen which was one of the biggest highlights.
Weâ€™ve been welcomed by May as we were family. The place that was created by her family is amazing and we recommend it to anyone.

We had an absolutely perfect stay at Loi's place, Maison de Sapa. The hotel and room were top clean and confortable. The staff was super helpful and offer lots of services. Loi was proactive, reactive and flexible. The breakfast was delicious. The location of the hotel was great. We like so much that we extended our stay of two nights. We definitely recommend for a stay in Sa Pa.

This was the BEST place we have stayed in Vietnam! A 10-15 minute walk to the main restaurants & church (where you meet for trekking). They provide a free brekky & have free fruit & tea for the guests. The staff here are so so helpful & friendly. The room was so clean & tidy, great bathroom & shower! A very quiet area with lots around. A great place for people who work remotely as there are lots of tables & chairs with a quiet working space & power points! Defs recommend this place!!!!

We loved our stay, from the process of checking in to checking out were pleasant. The staff here are the sweetest and friendliest. Not to mention the bed is extremely comfortable, not the typical hard bed that is common in Vietnam. You can tell they use quality bed sheets, soap
and there's always running hot water. They even have good options for breakfast. It's only a 5 minute walk to the Sapa Station and center, the only downside is the hill back up but not bad. There's marts along the way and few restaurants. Overall highly recommend here!

Tout Ã©tait excellent ! La chambre parfaitement identique Ã  lâ€™annonce, un accueil incroyable.

My stay at Maison de Sapa couldnâ€™t have been better.
Although I had some minor issues on my check-in (my grab took me to the wrong address, not hostâ€™s fault), the staff was really helpful and kind, even though I was tired and cranky about it.
The place is perfect, I mean it. Itâ€™s clean, comfortable (the bed/pillows were the BEST), the breakfast is tasty, the host is responsive and attentive and kind. The location is great as well, as itâ€™s a bit secluded but just a 9 min walk to the city centre. I cannot think of any complaints whatsoever. I strongly recommend this place if youâ€™re looking to relax while exploring Sapa! Thanks for everything, specially for your patience and kindness.
so.nice people nin this place! they help us with the luggages, they kept them because of our trekking trip to sapa for 1 day! I suggest you the French  toast as a breakfast,  it was delicious!!
Thanks for being so helpful and lovely girls! Lovely place and pleasant experience
had a fantastic stay, front of house staff were really helpful, the room was nice and a location just a short work into town was a good fit to explore Sapa.

It wasnâ€™t too bad of a location since it was near Sapa town. However,  there were bugs, spiders and ants in the room. Some of the towels were dirty as well. It was a pretty cheap airbnb but I would pay for a better apartment next time as this room felt dirty and unsafe to live in. Owner was super nice and friendly though. Would recommend staying here if you are not afraid of insects.

A good value stay in Sa Pa with a lovely wine bar to relax and meet the other guests. The room was comfy with a nice view. The only issue is there are no windows & we found the room to smell fairly damp & there was significant condensation on the walls, otherwise a good stay!

Le logement proposÃ© correspond totalement Ã  la description. Quelques minutes Ã  pied seulement du centre-ville. Quartier hyper calme, le logement est propre. Had an amazing stay with Anh (one of the 3 idiots ğŸ˜„)!
There was a power issue at the original place, so they moved us to their new property â€” but they handled it so smoothly with great communication plus its close proximity to the bus station was cherry on top!
The room was super clean and had everything we needed. The hosts were really sweet. They let us leave our bags after checkout, and even let us shower before heading out.
Would totally recommend for a chill, stress-free stay in Sapa!

Had a great time staying at Whisper Home. It had all the amenities needed for the weather, and most importantly, it was very close to the city center - a 5 minute walk, yet it was quiet and peaceful. I would definitely recommend it and stay there again when I visit Sapa. And also the Host were super responsive and warm. Thank you.â¤ï¸

I loved the vibe of the place. It seems remote because of the exclusive vibe but actually it is super close to Sun Plaza, restaurants and stores. Beside it is The Mist where you can get coffee and breakfast. The room is clean and the bed is big, even has a heater since Sapa is cold when we were there. Overall, I loved our stay.
Too bad we were not able to spend the first night there because of my poor scheduling (we booked 2 nights). I would have liked to enjoy what the bar has to offer. Did I mention there is a bar just right outside our room? Will definitely come back and this place is super recommended!

such a nice vibe i was having while staying here. it has a bar with good beverages too. make friends while hanging out there. the owner is so friendly and overall experience there is fun and memorableğŸ«¶ğŸ¼

We will keep a very cool and great memory of our stay. He''s a very great bartender with unique and delicious homemade cocktails. I would love to be stay here again ! i recommand 100%

Quiet, beautiful and near to the center of Tam Coc
Very nice atmosphere and overall lovely place and host!

had such a wonderful time staying with Whisper Home, on our first night, enjoyed the fireplace at the hidden bar :) the hosts gave us great advice on visiting Sapa and other parts of Vietnam, and it made the whole stay so much more memorable! the amenities provided really helped us to warm up in the Sapa cold too.
Yen the host also constantly checked in on us and was responsive to our questions.
there is a nice cafe located right beside this airbnb too. its also easy to get grab from there too.
MOST IMPORTANTLY, we love Chot the guard dog!!! ğŸ¶ğŸ¶he was such a cutie, he followed us to the cafe and followed us back to the airbnb when we had to grab our stuff. he waited for grab with us when we had to leave tooğŸ¥²ğŸ¥² dont forget to give him pats when you see him sleeping outside the rooms. we wish we had brought him some treats and blankets to warm him up (although the host mentioned that he prefers to stay outside) :)

Great place in the mountains

Paviâ€™s home was wonderful! It is so beautiful and the surrounding area is peaceful and gorgeous. We were able to rent scooters that were brought right to the place and get recommendations for trekking in the area. We also got our laundry done and they were so helpful and responsive every time we had questions. And on top of that the cutest and sweetest dogs ever love there. Highly recommend!

The stay was very beautiful and surrounded by nature. It was peaceful and private. It was slightly away from the main Sapa market, but hey it was totally worth the time and the view. if I had to go there again would definitely be!

I had a great stay at Pavi Home! The place is absolutely worth it, from the beautiful views to the warm and welcoming staff. They were incredibly helpful in arranging my transport and tours, which made everything so convenient. What truly made the experience special was the people. Highly recommended!

We really enjoyed our stay at Pavi's. It is a beautiful place in a quiet area outside of Sa Pa. The host Jack and his super friendly dogs made us feel at home immediately!  The location and views are insanely beautiful. Food is good and we also loved the trekking tour with a local that Jack arranged for us. Definitely recommend if you want to stay outside the touristy city. It is also possible to rent a motor cycle and explore the area yourself.

Our stay at Paviâ€™s place was so lovely. The location is out of the busy tourist areas surrounded by local villages and rice fields, which was exactly what we wanted. The views from the top balcony stole our hearts as well as the cute puppy dogs! We felt very heard by all the staff and even when we asked to swap rooms the second day (because the bathroom fan wasnâ€™t working), it was a swift and easy process. Itâ€™s around 30 mins drive from the Sapa town but if you can drive or rent a car shouldnâ€™t be any issue to go around. Rental is available too and pretty good place to stay. You can hike near by waterfall as well if youâ€™re adventurous. Hope to go back if there is a chance.

A beautiful, clean accommodation with a wonderful garden. The host was incredibly friendly and offered many services such as breakfast, dinner, and trekking tours. The driver who always took us to Sa Pa was also extremely friendly and helpful!
The only downside was the bathroom floor, which stayed wet for a long time after taking a shower.

Pavi is amazing! Wonderful service, quick responses, sincere guy. Stayed there for 3 nights. Pavi attends to your every need with immediacy. The host is very accommodating and friendly, check in was very smooth even at 10pm. He offers trekking services at a good price, which we would consider if it could fit in our itinerary. He has a driver that can bring you anywhere. Hailing grab is easy too! Iâ€™ve never once had difficulty even with such a location.
I missed breakfast timing once, but Pavi still brought the food to our room when he didnâ€™t have to. I wasnâ€™t the best patron, and still, wonderful service all round. The fried spring rolls is a must order!
A 10min straight walk along the road to Sapa Eco Villas where they offer spa+herbal services for cheap. Another scenic 10mins and itâ€™s a really big supermarket called Thach Son. Another 5mins and youâ€™re at Sailing Cafe!
The house is decent, but the view, service, and the cats/small dogs in the area will win your heart! I promise!

It was a very nice and private place to stay at but it would be better if they include shuttle to town. Communication barrier led to misunderstanding so itâ€™s good to double confirm things with the host.

Excellent view, cute pets, very cozy. I enjoyed the food at the airbnb as well.
I did not plan much for my trip so I went ahead with the tours they provided. Did the tour with paint workshop and discovered their beautiful cafe right in the middle of the rice terraces ğŸ˜

We had a pleasant stay at Paviâ€™s. The view is beautiful and location is quiet. Our highlight was playing with the beautiful and friendly dogs. ğŸ¥° Please note it is not close to amenities or restaurants so if you donâ€™t have a motorbike, you are restricted to only eating at the homestay. The restaurant food is fine but pretty overpriced. Unfortunately it was quite hot and humid during our stay and the air conditioner in our room did not work effectively. The host gave us a fan but basically said itâ€™s working fine and itâ€™s just an old system when the air coming out was clearly not cool airâ€¦
It would have been nice to have a water refill station in the room since there was no way to buy more water without going into town.
Overall a nice place to consider staying at. Comfortable bed and nice hot shower!

Meine Freundin und ich verbrachten 5 wundervolle NÃ¤chte in dieser Unterkunft und kÃ¶nnen mit Sicherheit sagen, dass es die beste Unterkunft war, die wir in unseren 2 Monaten in Vietnam erlebt haben. Die auÃŸergewÃ¶hnliche Gastfreundschaft und das harmonische Zusammenleben mit der Natur und den sÃ¼ÃŸen Hunden haben unseren Aufenthalt unvergesslich gemacht. Von der Ankunft bis zur Abreise war alles perfekt. Wir konnten sogar nach Absprache frÃ¼her einchecken. Die Gastgeber sind unglaublich freundlich und haben uns das GefÃ¼hl gegeben, wie zu Hause zu sein. Das Essen ist unglaublich lecker und wird jeden Abend frisch zubereitet. Wir hatten hier die wahrscheinlich besten FrÃ¼hlingsrollen unserer Reise. Die Umgebung ist atemberaubend und bietet eine Oase der Ruhe und Erholung. Es gibt viele WandermÃ¶glichkeiten in der NÃ¤he. Der Gastgeber hat uns viele Tipps und Empfehlungen gegeben. Wir kÃ¶nnen diese Unterkunft wÃ¤rmstens empfehlen und werden auf jeden Fall wiederkommen.

Wir wurden herzlich im Homestay empfangen, nachdem uns ein persÃ¶nlicher Fahrer aus Sapa Zentrum abgeholt hat. Der Ausblick ist wirklich beruhigend und der schÃ¶nste von allen Homestays und Hotels, die wir gesehen hatten. Wir verbrachten hier 5 NÃ¤chte und waren sehr froh, dass es etwas weiter abseits war und wir den Blick und die Ruhe genieÃŸen konnten. Es werden verschiedene Trekking Touren angeboten. Die Zimmer waren einfach und ausreichend. Wir werden die Gastgeber, den Ort und die Hunde in positiver Erinnerung behalten.
Loved the food and the host - the room was alright!

Las habitaciones de Pavi son ideales si queires descubrir la naturaleza real de SA-PA, si bien son algo bÃ¡sicas pues se encuentran en la campiÃ±a yo no tuve ningÃºn problema, entendemos que por el terreno y la ubicaciÃ³n rural puede haber algo de tierra, y pues humedad, sin embargo considero que Pavi y su familia intentan hacer todo lo posible por que el lugar sea agradable para la estadÃ­a, (yo solo cuidarÃ­a un poco mÃ¡s ciertos detalles de limpieza pero considero que son mÃ¡s culturales que un descuido en sÃ­ mismo) la comida de Pavi es deliciosa y barata, las motos son buenas y estables y a excelente precio, estÃ¡ algo alejado del pueblo pero vale la pena lo que gastas en ir y venir teniendo estas vistas tan espectaculares, sus perritos y su gato son un amor y en general el servicio es muy barato y bueno, volverÃ­a sin duda pues fue mi lugar favorito en Vietnam! Gracias.

We had a wonderful experience at this place. It is a basic but peaceful accommodation, perfect for relaxation. The view from the balcony overlooking the valley is absolutely stunning, especially in the morning when watching the sunrise. We also greatly appreciated the meals, BBQ, and hotpot. The host's attentiveness made our stay even more enjoyable. This is definitely a place we would return to in the future.

We would absolutely recommend anyone staying here. Pavi's home has everything you need in the room and a nice little restaurant with the best cooking we had in Sapa, which they all make themselves. They have different daily hikes you can take and will help you wherever they can. We absolutely loved it!

Sur Pin is the town which is 30 minutes by car from SaPa. The host explained that they and other hosts had the same problem with airbnb who kept listing it as SaPa. The streets have no names so airbnb hasnâ€™t figured this one out. The location is stunning and very peaceful away from the noise of Sapa which is far larger than I expected. Pavi is a terrific host and I highly recommend his place
Uitstekend verblijf met een prachtige locatie!

We loved our stay at the chalet. The host was extremely responsive and accommodating, catering to all of our needs and offering great recommendations. The meals were delicious. The chalet is in a very peaceful location away from the hustle and bustle of town. We wouldn't hesitate to stay again or recommend the chalet to our friends and families.

A very peaceful stay in the village. Amazing view. You donâ€™t need to visit the fake Cat Cat village if youâ€™re already staying in a real village.
The chef was great, he didnâ€™t know english but that wasnâ€™t a big issue. Thereâ€™s also a very chill dog that roams around the house, but never comes inside. Felt right at home at Huyenâ€™s place.

We had an amazing stay, Huyen was very helpful. Our bus came in 2 hours later than expected but she helped us with a taxi to the airbnb. The view was amazing. Very peaceful. Mr.River made us good breakfast and dinner. Felt very safe. Huyen also gave us recommendations for drivers and things to do.

We loved our stay in this beautiful chalet overlooking the mountains. The views were incredible and the garden around the house was lovely!
One thing to note for anyone considering staying here is that it is a 30-45 min drive from town - the roads are very rough from the recent typhoon. Other than that, this place was perfect :)
Thankyou again for all your help Huyen with finding taxis for our group of six and to Sung for his help with our suitcases.

Huyenâ€™s home is far more than what we expected.. it definitely exceeded our expectations! EVERYTHING about the home is perfect. It is beautifully kept, so so so clean and tidy! It was spotless when we arrived. Mr River is absolutely amazing and so so helpful.. he cooked us so many delicious meals!
The views are stunning and it is just so peaceful up there.
Can not say enough good things about this stay. Only downfall is that we didnâ€™t stay long enough!
Thank you for having us Huyen & Mr River!
We will be back one day â¤ï¸

Stunning location with incredible views, perfect for those looking for a relaxing and peaceful trip. A super spacious home with beautiful dogs and an amazing chef. The host was able to help us arrange transportation into sapa the fridge was stocked with drinks and the bedrooms were well equipped for the cold weather with electric blankets and heaters. To get into sapa it is about a 40 minute drive but we were able to find drivers easily with the help of our host. A great place for families would highly recommend.

We loved every bit of our stay at Huyenâ€™s place. Even if it was just overnight, we felt right at home. Huyen was very responsive, helped us with booking our rental taxi from the airport to the accommodation, and gave us suggestions on where to go. Unfortunately, due to the weather, we had limited visibility. We will definitely go back in the summer or spring. Thank you so much, Huyen!
Beautiful home with stunning surroundings. Host was kind and super responsive. Highly recommend!

Stunning view and a peaceful vibe. To get there you have to go through rough roads, so itâ€™s not ideal if you plan to go back and forth to the town center often. Perfect for relaxing and enjoying the homestay.

Huyenâ€™s home is amazing!!! We had such a perfect time. The house is beautiful and the surroundings are spectacular and so peaceful. Nice to be outside of town and away from busy areas. Huyen is incredibly kind and helpful and the perfect host. Canâ€™t wait to stay again.

This place in Sa Pa is absolutely the best! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a peaceful, beautiful retreat. The space is incredibly spacious, and every corner feels like itâ€™s straight out of a dream or a fairy tale. The tranquility and charm of the surroundings are unmatched!
Huyen and her husband are very welcoming host! They are very, very kind! Best host if you ask me!
Itâ€™s truly a perfect escape. If youâ€™re visiting Sa Pa, this is the place to stay!

I knew the place was almost 30-40 minutes away from the city centre but chose it primarily for the amazing views and it was worth every penny. Huyen was really helpful and assisted us in every part of the journey. Cannot recommend this place enough. Such a gemâœ¨ï¸âœ¨ï¸âœ¨ï¸
Huyenâ€™s place was beautiful! The surrounding mountain views were amazing. We also really appreciated Huyen helping us call our taxi and helping us with finding a tour guide.

Huyen is a great host, she made sure we were were fine throughout our stay and that we got back to Sa Pa from the house - even though a typhoon had just hit the north of Vietnam and roads were partially blocked. The housekeeper was also super friendly and helpful and a great cook. The rain caused by the typhoon had us stay inside but we still had a good time. Would love to come again to explore the beautiful mountain surroundings for hiking. All in all an accommodation to recommend!

Huyen is a great host! She helped us out a lot and was very responsive. The location, although a little hard to get to due to its distance from Sapa Town and the rough roads, is beautiful and serene. Huyen is able to arrange a taxi to get you to and fro Sapa Town, which helped us out tremendously.
The house also has a housekeeper that can prepare meals for you, something that we found convenient as it takes 30 minutes to get to town.
Overall, it was a pleasant stay.

Huyen's house is really special, homely and creative. We did find the house a bit cold though - there is a fireplace downstairs, and it was cosy and nice to sit there and play boardgames and talk. Upstairs, we had electric heaters. The house is big, though, so we still felt cold while not under the covers or in front of the fire place.
Huyen is always quick to answer any questions and comunicates clearly. Mr Song made us very nice meals and kept the house tidy and clean.
I would absolutely love to come back during spring, summer or autumn to really take advantage of the house and it's amazing surroundings.

I'm in love with this home! I questioned if it was worth it since it was just me and my boyfriend..and it was! The view is stunning and worth every penny. The house is so spacious, decorated well, and cozy. We are glad we chose to rent two motorbikes and drive separately with our bags since you have to make it up the mountain and some areas are rocky. It was a beautiful drive. Definitely pack what you want to drink/eat if you don't want to go back to town. There's some small shops, not too far by motorbike, that have beer and the basics. If you want to relax, Huyen can also help you find a taxi. The housekeeper is so kind and can help to cook, clean, etc. We felt that we wanted to be alone and he completely gave us our own privacy, but it was good to know he was available if we needed him. Thank you so much again ğŸ™ğŸ¼
Amazing place to stay!
it was a very nice stay, I would highly recommend it

Great host with a beautiful family! Their home is in the most beautiful location, and you have the ability to go on treks with the family around the area. The food they provided was delicious and made the experience even more special. Ya had amazing communication and helped me with transport, which was a big help since the homestay is a 30 minute drive out of town. Would highly recommend! :)

Ya is such a great host. She welcomed us with great care and was very curious and eager to share her culture with us. The house is something out of a movie. So beautiful, plus you will stay right in the village surrounded by rice and corn fields. No tourists in sight, just peace and quiet and lots of animals.
I highly recommend having dinner with the family if you have the chance, it was one of the best meals we had in Vietnam.
Amazing views, clean room, very friendly family and yummy food. felt right at home. Good experience, highly recommend if you wanna experience the less touristy side of sapa.

Yaâ€™s place is a gem! Itâ€™s nothing like other home stays in Sapa, you get to stay with Ya and her beautiful family in their incredible house nestled in the mountains. We had two meals with the family which were possibly the best weâ€™ve had in Vietnam.
We got to learn a little about Hmong culture; their food and language is so different to Vietnamese and definitely worth finding out about. Our room was so cozy and had a much-appreciated mosquito net. The views are just breathtaking, and Ya was so kind and generous. Thank you so much, we hope we can come back!

Yaâ€™s home is very beautiful, clean, + great value. Ya is a kind and generous woman, + her kids are lovely. The food was tasty + affordable. It is a very quiet place in the rice fields, among other Hmong families. You can get a glimpse into the everyday life of this indigenous group of people :)
Itâ€™s important to mention that this stay is not for everyone. It is not far from a main road, but the walk is very steep (do not try riding up it with an automatic scooter, you need at least a semi if you want to use a bike). If you are someone who has physical limitations, I would consider whether this is a good fit for you. In the summer this place was a little too hot for me as there is no fan and few windows. I did mention this to the host, however, and she accepted my feedback very graciously, so I believe future guests may have a fan. Double check with the host ğŸ˜‰
It was a unique and beautiful stay, and I would recommend it to adventurous and culturally curious souls :) best of luck Ya!

I had a great stay here!! Luna and Äáº­uâ€™s home is full of meaningful details. From hand-dyed linens to pleasant warm-toned lighting, this home stay is the embodiment of coziness. I wish I had stayed longer and did one of the workshops as well! Also, the hosts were incredibly accommodating of my last minute booking and were around if I needed anything. (P.S. they have the cutest cats and puppies as well:))

Wow. This place was easily the best accomodation we had in Vietnam. The hosts, Luna and Dau, were so nice and welcoming in their beautiful, historic home. Ta Van itself was great to explore every day, but it was also just a cool place to relax. There are many places within walking distance to see and bars/restaurants. But they make their own amazing salt coffee too! If you are ever in North Vietnam, I would highly recommend to stay here. Thanks again and looking forward to returning,
Rupert & Lydia

A beautiful Homestay in a beautiful place with beautiful hosts. The energy of Bluebird is unmatched: Luna and Dau are lovely, helpful people with great taste. The Homestay is in the centre of the village so itâ€™s easy to go trekking plus it offers delicious beef noodles for when youâ€™re back. Thanks for a great stay ladies!
Luna And Äáº­u sind zwei wunderbare Gastgeberinnen und ihre Tiere die beste Gesellschaft. Das schÃ¶ne Haus ist mit viel Liebe zum Detail gestaltet und ich hatte einen groÃŸartigen Aufenthalt.

Luna and Dau were very kind hosts (& very cool people), and we were super grateful they invite us to the rice festival while we were there! Their very beautifully renovated homestay ended up being the perfect place for my partner & I to comfortably recharge for a few days in the middle of our busy 2 months. Itâ€™s a very cute artsy space with adorable cats & dogs to keep company, and in a nice area with accessible food options as well as trekking tours. Their stewed beef noodles & salted coffee were also delicious!! Wish we couldâ€™ve stayed a bit longer and tried some of their workshops :â€™)
Thank you! Hope to meet again <3

Had a great stay. It's a beautiful old wooden house decorated with a lot of passion. Also the location in the village is a great way to escape the masses from Sapa. Still there's everything you need nearby. Luna and Dau are super friendly, would come back anytime.

luna and dau are very welcoming and helpful :) the house was really nice as well and if youâ€™re looking for somewhere quiet around sa pa with great views and also experience how is it like living in a vietnamese village look no further i would highly recommend staying with them!! also can i just say that theyâ€™re a really cute couple as well!! :)

Very quaint and welcoming. She puts so much care into her place.

Staying here felt like home in the best way possible. The place was cozy, Luna and ÃÇu were so welcoming and accommodatingâ€”they made me feel like part of the family, and went out of their way to make sure I felt comfortable  ğŸ¤ Their recommendations completely enhanced my trip, but what made it even more special were the pets! Iâ€™ll never get over Cu Ti the dog - such a sweetheart! and the adorable cats who made every moment even cozier. The game night and laughs we shared will always be one of my favorite memories of this place. I honestly wish I couldâ€™ve stayed longer and will definitely be coming back. Highly, highly recommend this placeâ€”itâ€™s more than just a stay; itâ€™s an experience Iâ€™ll never forget!
Nice place to stay.  Beef noodles were yummy ğŸ˜‹

We had the most incredible stay at Blue Bird Homestay, and it was all thanks to our wonderful hosts, Luna and Ãau. From the moment we arrived, they made us feel so welcome, like we were part of their family. Their kindness and hospitality truly made our experience unforgettable.
One of the highlights of our stay was the delicious beef noodlesâ€”hands down some of the best weâ€™ve ever had!
We also absolutely loved spending time with their adorable pets, who added so much joy to our days. Whether it was playful moments or just the comforting presence of furry friends, they made the homestay feel even more like home.
Another unforgettable experience was the indigo dyeing class. Learning about the traditional techniques and getting hands-on with the dyeing process was both fascinating and fun. Luna shared her knowledge with so much passion, making the workshop an incredibly special and immersive experience.
Everything about Blue Bird Homestay was perfect!

Abbiamo avuto il privilegio di alloggiare in questa meravigliosa casa antica, interamente costruita in legno e situata nel pittoresco villaggio di Ta Van, nella provincia di Sa Pa. Questo luogo incantevole ci ha permesso di immergerci in un autentico paradiso terrestre.
Ogni angolo della casa racconta una storia: piena di dettagli unici e affascinanti, curata con amore e attenzione. I suoni della natura circostante si mescolano con lâ€™atmosfera storica della struttura, creando unâ€™esperienza indimenticabile.
I proprietari, sempre presenti ma mai invadenti, ci hanno fatto sentire accolti e a nostro agio. Ãˆ evidente la passione con cui gestiscono questo luogo speciale.
Siamo stati felicissimi di vivere questa esperienza e porteremo con noi il ricordo di questo rifugio incantato!

We knew we made the right choice when we first stepped into the place and were greeted with a warm welcome. Dieu was really friendly and helpful. He made sure that our needs and comfort were met. The place felt very homely and we looked forward to going back to the hotel at the end of every day. 11/10 experience and definitely would recommend!

Had a lovely stay here. We had a Mountain View and it didnâ€™t disappoint. Was beautiful and peaceful. Our Room and communal area was clean and inviting. Was in a great location, near restaurants and not too far to get the train to fansipan. Host was extremely helpful and friendly. Helped us book our bus tickets and tours. He also checked in with us every day and made sure we were okay. Would 100% recommend and stay again.

Very spacious! Bathroom is clean and big! Was very foggy during the majority of our stay but when the sky cleared up we got the best view of the Sa Pa mountain from our room. Highlight of our trip was our trek to the Hmong Village, definitely recommend booking the experience. Thank you Dieu for the great accommodation!

We had a lovely stay at the mega view hotel
We just sad we didnâ€™t have a longer stay
It has a real cosy and homely feeling
Very friendly and helpful staff
The bedroom was lovely with amazing views and very comfortable bed
A lovely friendly cat called chicken as well was a lovely surprise
We would highly recommend to stay here :)

Unbelievably beautiful location with picturesque view at the same time located close to restaurants and stuff, beautifully designed suit. Owner is always ready to assist with whatever you need. 100% recommend

The place is walkable Sapa Square and restaurants so itâ€™s really a plus! They are also very accommodating. We will surely be back here if we decided to visit Sapa again! It also has the most beautiful view ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay.
The host was proactive in providing assistance with tours and recommendations. He also helped me to get my phone repaired.
The room itself had beautiful views of the valley and mountains, was very clean and comfortable, and the bathroom had great water pressure.
If I was to return to SaPa I would stay again.

Located among so many restaurants, our favourite one was Casa Italia. Very well run homestay with so many rooms and a basement dorm. Breakfast set cooked by host was delicious at just 60k.
Recommended by the host for a walking tour, we took it up and saw so many scenic views ğŸ˜
The only downside is a flight of 30m stairs you have to climb to get to the main town.
Other than that, highly recommended 5 star Airbnb ğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸğŸŒŸ
Had a wonderful stay. Room has a fantastic view of the mountains. Would recommend also doing the day trekking :) Nini (the local guide) was so accomodating. Will definitely come back.

Anh Dieu is great! Super communicative and very friendly. Goes above and beyond to accommodate his guests. We got there well before arrival time, and he was able to set us up in a downstairs public room just so we could rest before beginning a tour that he arranged for us. From start to finish this was a great experience. The view from the room were a phenomenal.

A beautiful stay in Sapa! The host was super helpful, allowing us to book another night and check in at 5am when our bus got in. He also helped us with local recommendations and booked us our bus tickets back to Hanoi when we left it last minute. Our room was absolutely gorgeous with a breathtaking view. It felt completely unreal! We had absolutely everything we needed and nothing was too much trouble. I would highly recommend!!

The place was great and our host was very friendly as well the staff there. He was checking how our trip was very time he sees us comes inside the building. And when checking out the staff helped us bring our luggage up the stairs. Overall the stay was great. Definitely coming back in the future!
